gunkshot.desc: Has a 30% chance to poison the target. If the weather is Acid Rain, this move does not check accuracy.
gunkshot.shortDesc: 30% chance to psn target. Can't miss in Acid Rain
gunkshot.name: Gunk Shot

hurricane.desc: Has a 30% chance to confuse the target. This move can hit a target using Bounce, Fly, or Sky Drop, or is under the effect of Sky Drop. If the weather is Primordial Sea, Rain Dance, Hail or Snow, this move does not check accuracy. If the weather is Desolate Land or Sunny Day, this move's accuracy is 50%. If this move is used against a Pokemon holding Utility Umbrella, this move's accuracy remains at 70%.
hurricane.shortDesc: 30% chance to confuse target. Can't miss in rain or hail.
hurricane.name: Hurricane

weatherball.desc: Power doubles if a weather condition other than Delta Stream is active, and this move's type changes to match. Ice type during Snow, Water type during Primordial Sea or Rain Dance, Rock type during Sandstorm, and Fire type during Desolate Land or Sunny Day. If the user is holding Utility Umbrella and uses Weather Ball during Primordial Sea, Rain Dance, Desolate Land, or Sunny Day, this move remains Normal type and does not double in power.
weatherball.name: Weather Ball
weatherball.shortDesc: Power doubles and type varies in each weather.

venomdrench.desc: Lowers the target's Attack, Special Attack, and Speed by 1 stage if the target is poisoned or Acid Rain is on the field. Fails if the target is not poisoned or Acid Rain isn't on the field.
venomdrench.shortDesc: Lowers Atk/Sp. Atk/Speed of poisoned foes/during Acid Rain by 1.
venomdrench.name: Venom Drench

thief.name: Thief
thief.desc: If this attack was successful and the user has not fainted, it steals the target's held item if the user is not holding one. The target's item is not stolen if it is a Mail or Z-Crystal, or if the target is a Kyogre holding a Blue Orb, a Groudon holding a Red Orb, a Giratina holding a Griseous Orb, an Arceus holding a Plate, a Genesect holding a Drive, a Silvally holding a Memory, or a Pokemon that can Mega Evolve holding the Mega Stone for its species. Items lost to this move cannot be regained with Recycle or the Harvest Ability.
thief.shortDesc: If the user has no item, it steals the target's.

electricterrain.name: Electric Terrain
electricterrain.desc: For 5 turns, the terrain becomes Electric Terrain. During the effect, the power of Electric-type attacks made by grounded Pokemon is multiplied by 1.3 and grounded Pokemon cannot fall asleep; Pokemon already asleep do not wake up. Grounded Pokemon cannot become affected by Yawn or fall asleep from its effect. Camouflage transforms the user into an Electric type, Nature Power becomes Thunderbolt, and Secret Power has a 30% chance to cause paralysis. Fails if the current terrain is Electric Terrain.

grassyterrain.name: Grassy Terrain
grassyterrain.desc: For 5 turns, the terrain becomes Grassy Terrain. During the effect, the power of Grass-type attacks used by grounded Pokemon is multiplied by 1.3, the power of Bulldoze, Earthquake, and Magnitude used against grounded Pokemon is multiplied by 0.5, and grounded Pokemon have 1/16 of their maximum HP, rounded down, restored at the end of each turn, including the last turn. Camouflage transforms the user into a Grass type, Nature Power becomes Energy Ball, and Secret Power has a 30% chance to cause sleep. Fails if the current terrain is Grassy Terrain.

mistyterrain.name: Misty Terrain
mistyterrain.desc: For 5 turns, the terrain becomes Misty Terrain. During the effect, the power of Dragon-type attacks used against grounded Pokemon is multiplied by 0.5 and grounded Pokemon cannot be inflicted with a non-volatile status condition nor confusion. Grounded Pokemon can become affected by Yawn but cannot fall asleep from its effect. Camouflage transforms the user into a Fairy type, Nature Power becomes Moonblast, and Secret Power has a 30% chance to lower Special Attack by 1 stage. Fails if the current terrain is Misty Terrain.
mistyterrain.shortDesc: 5 turns. Can't status,-Dragon power vs grounded.

psychicterrain.name: Psychic Terrain
psychicterrain.desc: For 5 turns, the terrain becomes Psychic Terrain. During the effect, the power of Psychic-type attacks made by grounded Pokemon is multiplied by 1.3 and grounded Pokemon cannot be hit by moves with priority greater than 0, unless the target is an ally. Camouflage transforms the user into a Psychic type, Nature Power becomes Psychic, and Secret Power has a 30% chance to lower the target's Speed by 1 stage. Fails if the current terrain is Psychic Terrain.

gravity.name: Gravity
gravity.desc: For 5 turns, the evasiveness of all active Pokemon is multiplied by 0.6. At the time of use, Bounce, Fly, Magnet Rise, Sky Drop, and Telekinesis end immediately for all active Pokemon. During the effect, Bounce, Fly, Flying Press, High Jump Kick, Jump Kick, Magnet Rise, Sky Drop, Splash, and Telekinesis are prevented from being used by all active Pokemon. Ground-type attacks, Spikes, Toxic Spikes, Sticky Web, and the Arena Trap Ability can affect Flying types or Pokemon with the Levitate Ability. Fails if this move is already in effect.

assist.name: Assist
assist.desc: A random move among those known by the user's party members is selected for use. Does not select Assist, Baneful Bunker, Beak Blast, Belch, Bestow, Blazing Torque, Bounce, Celebrate, Chatter, Circle Throw, Combat Torque, Copycat, Counter, Covet, Destiny Bond, Detect, Dig, Dive, Dragon Tail, Endure, Feint, Fly, Focus Punch, Follow Me, Helping Hand, Hold Hands, King's Shield, Magical Torque, Mat Block, Me First, Metronome, Mimic, Mirror Coat, Mirror Move, Nature Power, Noxious Torque, Phantom Force, Protect, Rage Powder, Roar, Shadow Force, Shell Trap, Sketch, Sky Drop, Sleep Talk, Snatch, Spiky Shield, Spotlight, Struggle, Switcheroo, Thief, Transform, Trick, Whirlwind, or Wicked Torque.
assist.shortDesc: Uses a random move known by a team member.

copycat.name: Copycat
copycat.desc: The user uses the last move used by any Pokemon, including itself. Fails if no move has been used, or if the last move used was Assist, Baneful Bunker, Beak Blast, Behemoth Bash, Behemoth Blade, Belch, Bestow, Blazing Torque, Celebrate, Chatter, Circle Throw, Combat Torque, Copycat, Counter, Covet, Destiny Bond, Detect, Dragon Tail, Dynamax Cannon, Endure, Feint, Focus Punch, Follow Me, Helping Hand, Hold Hands, King's Shield, Magical Torque, Mat Block, Me First, Metronome, Mimic, Mirror Move, Nature Power, Noxious Torque, Protect, Rage Powder, Roar, Shell Trap, Sketch, Sleep Talk, Snatch, Spiky Shield, Spotlight, Struggle, Switcheroo, Thief, Transform, Trick, Whirlwind, or Wicked Torque.
copycat.shortDesc: Uses the last move used in the battle.

extremeevoboost.name: Extreme Evoboost
extremeevoboost.desc: Raises the user's Attack, Defense, Special Attack, Special Defense, and Speed by 2 stages.
extremeevoboost.shortDesc: Raises user's Atk, Def, SpA, SpD, and Spe by 2.

knockoff.name: Knock Off
knockoff.desc: If the target is holding an item that can be removed from it, ignoring the Sticky Hold Ability, this move's power is multiplied by 1.5. If the user has not fainted, the target loses its held item. This move cannot cause Pokemon with the Sticky Hold Ability to lose their held item or cause a Kyogre, a Groudon, a Giratina, an Arceus, a Genesect, a Silvally, a Zacian, or a Zamazenta to lose their Blue Orb, Red Orb, Griseous Orb, Plate, Drive, Memory, Rusted Sword, or Rusted Shield respectively. Items lost to this move cannot be regained with Recycle or the Harvest Ability.
knockoff.shortDesc: 1.5x damage if foe holds an item. Removes item.

trickroom.name: Trick Room
trickroom.desc: For 5 turns, the Speed of every Pokemon is recalculated for the purposes of determining turn order. During the effect, each Pokemon's Speed is considered to be (10000 - its normal Speed), and if this value is greater than 8191, 8192 is subtracted from it. If this move is used during the effect, the effect ends.
trickroom.shortDesc: Goes last. For 5 turns, turn order is reversed.

magicroom.name: Magic Room
magicroom.desc: For 5 turns, the held items of all active Pokemon have no effect. An item's effect of causing forme changes is unaffected, but any other effects from such items are negated. During the effect, Fling and Natural Gift are prevented from being used by all active Pokemon. If this move is used during the effect, the effect ends.
magicroom.shortDesc: For 5 turns, all held items have no effect.

wonderroom.name: Wonder Room
wonderroom.desc: For 5 turns, all active Pokemon have their Defense and Special Defense stats swapped. Stat stage changes are unaffected. If this move is used during the effect, the effect ends.
wonderroom.shortDesc: For 5 turns, all Defense and Sp. Def stats switch.

absorb.name: Absorb
absorb.desc: The user recovers 1/2 the HP lost by the target, rounded half up. If Big Root is held by the user, the HP recovered is 1.3x normal, rounded half down.
absorb.shortDesc: User recovers 50% of the damage dealt.

acid.desc: Has a 40% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by 1 stage.
acid.shortDesc: 40% chance to lower the foe(s) Sp. Def by 1.
acid.name: Acid

acidarmor.name: Acid Armor
acidarmor.desc: Raises the user's Defense by 2 stages.

airslash.name: Air Slash
airslash.desc: Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.
airslash.shortDesc: 30% chance to make the target flinch.

allyswitch.name: Ally Switch
allyswitch.desc: The user swaps positions with its ally. Fails if the user is the only Pokemon on its side. This move has a 1/X chance of being successful, where X starts at 1 and triples each time this move is successfully used. X resets to 1 if this move fails or if the user's last move used is not Ally Switch.
allyswitch.shortDesc: User and ally swap positions; using again can fail.

anchorshot.desc: Prevents the target from switching for four or five turns (seven turns if the user is holding Grip Claw). Causes damage to the target equal to 1/8 of its maximum HP (1/6 if the user is holding Binding Band), rounded down, at the end of each turn during effect. The target can still switch out if it is holding Shed Shell or uses Baton Pass, Flip Turn, Parting Shot, Shed Tail, Teleport, U-turn, or Volt Switch. The effect ends if either the user or the target leaves the field, or if the target uses Mortal Spin, Rapid Spin, or Substitute successfully. This effect is not stackable or reset by using this or another binding move.
anchorshot.shortDesc: Traps and damages the target for 4-5 turns.
anchorshot.name: Anchor Shot

appleacid.desc: Has a 100% chance to lower the targets's Special Defense by 1 stage.
appleacid.shortDesc: 100% chance to lower the targets' Sp. Def by 1.
appleacid.name: Apple Acid

aquaring.name: Aqua Ring
aquaring.desc: The user has 1/16 of its maximum HP, rounded down, restored at the end of each turn while it remains active. If Big Root is held by the user, the HP recovered is 1.3x normal, rounded half down. If the user uses Baton Pass, the replacement will receive the healing effect.
aquaring.shortDesc: User recovers 1/16 max HP per turn.

armthrust.name: Arm Thrust
armthrust.desc: Hits two to five times. Has a 35% chance to hit two or three times and a 15% chance to hit four or five times. If one of the hits breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the remaining hits. If the user has the Skill Link Ability, this move will always hit five times.

aromatherapy.name: Aromatherapy
aromatherapy.desc: Every Pokemon in the user's party is cured of its non-volatile status condition. Active Pokemon with the Sap Sipper Ability are not cured, unless they are the user.
aromatherapy.shortDesc: Cures the user's party of all status conditions.

assurance.name: Assurance
assurance.desc: Power doubles if the target has already taken damage this turn, other than direct damage from Belly Drum, confusion, Curse, or Pain Split.
assurance.shortDesc: Power doubles if target was damaged this turn.

attract.name: Attract
attract.desc: Causes the target to become infatuated, making it unable to attack 50% of the time. Fails if both the user and the target are the same gender, if either is genderless, or if the target is already infatuated. The effect ends when either the user or the target is no longer active. Pokemon with the Oblivious Ability or protected by the Aroma Veil Ability are immune.
attract.shortDesc: A target of the opposite gender gets infatuated.

aurasphere.name: Aura Sphere
aurasphere.desc: This move does not check accuracy.
aurasphere.shortDesc: This move does not check accuracy.

aurawheel.desc: If the user is a Morpeko in Full Belly Mode, this move is Electric type. If the user is a Morpeko in Hangry Mode, this move is Dark type. This move cannot be used successfully unless the user's current form, while considering Transform, is Full Belly or Hangry Mode Morpeko.
aurawheel.name: Aura Wheel

auroraveil.name: Aurora Veil
auroraveil.desc: For 5 turns, the user and its party members take 0.5x damage from physical and special attacks, or 0.66x damage if in a Double Battle; does not reduce damage further with Reflect or Light Screen. Critical hits ignore this protection. It is removed from the user's side if the user or an ally is successfully hit by Brick Break, Psychic Fangs, or Defog. Brick Break and Psychic Fangs remove the effect before damage is calculated. Lasts for 8 turns if the user is holding Light Clay. Fails unless the weather is Hail.
auroraveil.shortDesc: For 5 turns, damage to allies halved. Snow only.

babydolleyes.name: Baby-Doll Eyes
babydolleyes.desc: Lowers the target's Attack by 1 stage.

barrage.name: Barrage
barrage.desc: Hits two to five times. Has a 35% chance to hit two or three times and a 15% chance to hit four or five times. If one of the hits breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the remaining hits. If the user has the Skill Link Ability, this move will always hit five times.

bind.name: Bind
bind.desc: Prevents the target from switching for four or five turns (seven turns if the user is holding Grip Claw). Causes damage to the target equal to 1/8 of its maximum HP (1/6 if the user is holding Binding Band), rounded down, at the end of each turn during effect. The target can still switch out if it is holding Shed Shell or uses Baton Pass, Flip Turn, Parting Shot, Shed Tail, Teleport, U-turn, or Volt Switch. The effect ends if either the user or the target leaves the field, or if the target uses Mortal Spin, Rapid Spin, or Substitute successfully. This effect is not stackable or reset by using this or another binding move.
bind.shortDesc: Traps and damages the target for 4-5 turns.

block.name: Block
block.desc: Prevents the target from switching out. The target can still switch out if it is holding Shed Shell or uses Baton Pass, Flip Turn, Parting Shot, Teleport, U-turn, or Volt Switch. If the target leaves the field using Baton Pass, the replacement will remain trapped. The effect ends if the user leaves the field.
block.shortDesc: Prevents the target from switching out.

boneclub.desc: Has a 20% chance to make the target flinch.
boneclub.shortDesc: 20% chance to make the target flinch.
boneclub.name: Bone Club

bonemerang.name: Bonemerang
bonemerang.desc: Hits twice. If the first hit breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the second hit.

bonerush.name: Bone Rush
bonerush.desc: Hits two to five times. Has a 35% chance to hit two or three times and a 15% chance to hit four or five times. If one of the hits breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the remaining hits. If the user has the Skill Link Ability, this move will always hit five times.

bounce.name: Bounce
bounce.desc: Has a 30% chance to paralyze the target. This attack charges on the first turn and executes on the second. On the first turn, the user avoids all attacks other than Gust, Hurricane, Sky Uppercut, Smack Down, Thousand Arrows, Thunder, and Twister, and Gust and Twister have doubled power when used against it. If the user is holding a Power Herb, the move completes in one turn.

breakingswipe.desc: Has a 100% chance to lower the targets' Attack by 1 stage.
breakingswipe.shortDesc: Hits adjacent Pokemon. 100% chance to lower Attack by 1.
breakingswipe.name: Breaking Swipe

brutalswing.name: Brutal Swing
brutalswing.shortDesc: No additional effect. Hits adjacent Pokemon.

bubble.desc: Has a 75% chance to lower the target's Speed by 1 stage.
bubble.shortDesc: 75% chance to lower the foe(s) Speed by 1.
bubble.name: Bubble

bubblebeam.desc: Has a 40% chance to lower the target's Speed by 1 stage.
bubblebeam.shortDesc: 40% chance to lower the foe(s) Speed by 1.
bubblebeam.name: Bubble Beam

bulletseed.name: Bullet Seed
bulletseed.desc: Hits two to five times. Has a 35% chance to hit two or three times and a 15% chance to hit four or five times. If one of the hits breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the remaining hits. If the user has the Skill Link Ability, this move will always hit five times.

burningjealousy.name: Burning Jealousy
burningjealousy.desc: Has a 100% chance to burn the target if it had a stat stage raised this turn.
burningjealousy.shortDesc: 100% burns a target that had a stat rise this turn.

burnup.name: Burn Up
burnup.desc: Fails unless the user is a Fire type. If this move is successful and the user is not Terastallized, the user's Fire type becomes typeless as long as it remains active.
burnup.shortDesc: User's Fire type becomes typeless; must be Fire.

captivate.name: Captivate
captivate.desc: Lowers the target's Special Attack by 2 stages. The target is unaffected if both the user and the target are the same gender, or if either is genderless. Pokemon with the Oblivious Ability are immune.
captivate.shortDesc: Lowers the foe(s) Sp. Atk by 2 if opposite gender.

celebrate.desc: Raises the user's Attack, Defense, Special Attack, Special Defense, and Speed by 1 stage.
celebrate.shortDesc: Raises user's Atk, Def, SpA, SpD, and Spe by 1.
celebrate.name: Celebrate

chargebeam.name: Charge Beam
chargebeam.desc: Has a 70% chance to raise the user's Special Attack by 1 stage.
chargebeam.shortDesc: 70% chance to raise the user's Sp. Atk by 1.

clamp.name: Clamp
clamp.desc: Prevents the target from switching for four or five turns (seven turns if the user is holding Grip Claw). Causes damage to the target equal to 1/8 of its maximum HP (1/6 if the user is holding Binding Band), rounded down, at the end of each turn during effect. The target can still switch out if it is holding Shed Shell or uses Baton Pass, Flip Turn, Parting Shot, Shed Tail, Teleport, U-turn, or Volt Switch. The effect ends if either the user or the target leaves the field, or if the target uses Mortal Spin, Rapid Spin, or Substitute successfully. This effect is not stackable or reset by using this or another binding move.
clamp.shortDesc: Traps and damages the target for 4-5 turns.

clangingscales.name: Clanging Scales
clangingscales.desc: Lowers the user's Defense by 1 stage.

clangoroussoul.name: Clangorous Soul
clangoroussoul.desc: Raises the user's Attack, Defense, Special Attack, Special Defense, and Speed by 1 stage in exchange for the user losing 33% of its maximum HP, rounded down. Fails if the user would faint or if its Attack, Defense, Special Attack, Special Defense, and Speed stat stages would not change.
clangoroussoul.shortDesc: User loses 33% of its max HP. +1 to all stats.

cometpunch.name: Comet Punch
cometpunch.desc: Hits two to five times. Has a 35% chance to hit two or three times and a 15% chance to hit four or five times. If one of the hits breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the remaining hits. If the user has the Skill Link Ability, this move will always hit five times.

confide.name: Confide
confide.desc: Lowers the target's Special Attack by 1 stage.
confide.shortDesc: Lowers the target's Sp. Atk by 1.

constrict.desc: Has a 60% chance to lower the target's Speed by 1 stage.
constrict.shortDesc: 60% chance to lower the foe(s) Speed by 1.
constrict.name: Constrict

conversion.name: Conversion
conversion.desc: The user's type changes to match the original type of the move in its first move slot. Fails if the user cannot change its type, or if the type is one of the user's current types.
conversion.shortDesc: Changes user's type to match its first move.

conversion2.name: Conversion 2
conversion2.desc: The user's type changes to match a type that resists or is immune to the type of the last move used by the target, but not either of its current types. The determined type of the move is used rather than the original type. Fails if the target has not made a move, if the user cannot change its type, or if this move would only be able to select one of the user's current types.
conversion2.shortDesc: Changes user's type to resist target's last move.

cosmicpower.name: Cosmic Power
cosmicpower.desc: Raises the user's Defense and Special Defense by 1 stage.
cosmicpower.shortDesc: Raises the user's Defense and Sp. Def by 1.

craftyshield.name: Crafty Shield
craftyshield.desc: The user and its party members are protected from non-damaging attacks made by other Pokemon, including allies, during this turn. Fails if the user moves last this turn or if this move is already in effect for the user's side.
craftyshield.shortDesc: Protects allies from Status moves this turn.

crosspoison.name: Cross Poison
crosspoison.desc: Has a 10% chance to poison the target and a higher chance for a critical hit.
crosspoison.shortDesc: High critical hit ratio. 10% chance to poison.

cut.desc: Has a higher chance for a critical hit.
cut.name: Cut

darkestlariat.name: Darkest Lariat
darkestlariat.desc: Ignores the target's stat stage changes, including evasiveness.
darkestlariat.shortDesc: Ignores the target's stat stage changes.

darkvoid.desc: Causes the target to fall asleep.
darkvoid.shortDesc: Causes the foe(s) to fall asleep.
darkvoid.name: Dark Void

decorate.desc: Raises one adjacent ally's Attack and Special Attack by 2 stages.
decorate.shortDesc: Raises one adjacent ally's Attack and Sp. Atk by 2.
decorate.name: Decorate

defendorder.name: Defend Order
defendorder.desc: Raises the user's Defense and Special Defense by 1 stage.
defendorder.shortDesc: Raises the user's Defense and Sp. Def by 1.

destinybond.name: Destiny Bond
destinybond.desc: Until the user's next move, if an opposing Pokemon's attack knocks the user out, that Pokemon faints as well, unless the attack was Doom Desire or Future Sight. Fails if the user used this move successfully as its last move, disregarding moves used through the Dancer Ability.
destinybond.shortDesc: If an opponent knocks out the user, it also faints.

detect.name: Detect
detect.desc: The user is protected from most attacks made by other Pokemon during this turn. This move has a 1/X chance of being successful, where X starts at 1 and triples each time this move is successfully used. X resets to 1 if this move fails, if the user's last move used is not Baneful Bunker, Detect, Endure, King's Shield, Max Guard, Obstruct, Protect, Quick Guard, Silk Trap, Spiky Shield, or Wide Guard, or if it was one of those moves and the user's protection was broken. Fails if the user moves last this turn.
detect.shortDesc: Prevents moves from affecting the user this turn.

diamondstorm.desc: Has a 50% chance to raise the user's Defense by 1 stages.
diamondstorm.shortDesc: 50% chance to raise user's Defense by 1.
diamondstorm.name: Diamond Storm

dig.name: Dig
dig.desc: This attack charges on the first turn and executes on the second. On the first turn, the user avoids all attacks other than Earthquake and Magnitude but takes double damage from them, and is also unaffected by weather. If the user is holding a Power Herb, the move completes in one turn.

disarmingvoice.name: Disarming Voice
disarmingvoice.desc: This move does not check accuracy.
disarmingvoice.shortDesc: This move does not check accuracy. Hits foes.

dive.name: Dive
dive.desc: This attack charges on the first turn and executes on the second. On the first turn, the user avoids all attacks other than Surf and Whirlpool but takes double damage from them, and is also unaffected by weather. If the user is holding a Power Herb, the move completes in one turn.

dizzypunch.desc: Has a 35% chance to confuse the target.
dizzypunch.name: Dizzy Punch

doublehit.name: Double Hit
doublehit.desc: Hits twice. If the first hit breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the second hit.

doubleironbash.desc: Hits twice. If the first hit breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the second hit. Has a 25% chance to make the target flinch.
doubleironbash.shortDesc: Hits twice. 25% chance to make the target flinch.
doubleironbash.name: Double Iron Bash

doublekick.name: Double Kick
doublekick.desc: Hits twice. If the first hit breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the second hit.

doubleslap.name: Double Slap
doubleslap.desc: Hits two to five times. Has a 35% chance to hit two or three times and a 15% chance to hit four or five times. If one of the hits breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the remaining hits. If the user has the Skill Link Ability, this move will always hit five times.

dragondarts.name: Dragon Darts
dragondarts.desc: Hits twice. If the first hit breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the second hit. In Double Battles, this move attempts to hit the targeted Pokemon and its ally once each. If hitting one of these Pokemon would be prevented by immunity, protection, semi-invulnerability, an Ability, or accuracy, it attempts to hit the other Pokemon twice instead. If this move is redirected, it hits that target twice.
dragondarts.shortDesc: Hits twice. Doubles: Tries to hit each foe once.

dragontail.name: Dragon Tail
dragontail.desc: If both the user and the target have not fainted, the target is forced to switch out and be replaced with a random unfainted ally. This effect fails if the target used Ingrain previously, has the Suction Cups Ability, or this move hit a substitute.
dragontail.shortDesc: Forces the target to switch to a random ally.

drainingkiss.name: Draining Kiss
drainingkiss.desc: The user recovers 3/4 the HP lost by the target, rounded half up. If Big Root is held by the user, the HP recovered is 1.3x normal, rounded half down.
drainingkiss.shortDesc: User recovers 75% of the damage dealt.

drillpeck.desc: Has a higher chance for a critical hit.
drillpeck.name: Drill Peck

drumbeating.desc: Hits adjacent foes. Has a 100% chance to lower the targets' Speed by 1 stage.
drumbeating.shortDesc: Hits adjacent foes. 100% to lower the targets' Speed by 1.
drumbeating.name: Drum Beating

echoedvoice.name: Echoed Voice
echoedvoice.desc: For every consecutive turn that this move is used by at least one Pokemon, this move's power is multiplied by the number of turns to pass, but not more than 5.
echoedvoice.shortDesc: Power increases when used on consecutive turns.

eerieimpulse.name: Eerie Impulse
eerieimpulse.desc: Lowers the target's Special Attack by 2 stages.
eerieimpulse.shortDesc: Lowers the target's Sp. Atk by 2.

electrify.name: Electrify
electrify.desc: Causes the target's move to become Electric type this turn. Among effects that can change a move's type, this effect happens last. Fails if the target already moved this turn.
electrify.shortDesc: Changes the target's move to Electric this turn.

endure.name: Endure
endure.desc: The user will survive attacks made by other Pokemon during this turn with at least 1 HP. This move has a 1/X chance of being successful, where X starts at 1 and triples each time this move is successfully used. X resets to 1 if this move fails, if the user's last move used is not Baneful Bunker, Detect, Endure, King's Shield, Max Guard, Obstruct, Protect, Quick Guard, Silk Trap, Spiky Shield, or Wide Guard, or if it was one of those moves and the user's protection was broken. Fails if the user moves last this turn.
endure.shortDesc: User survives attacks this turn with at least 1 HP.

energyball.desc: Has a 15% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by 1 stage.
energyball.shortDesc: 15% chance to lower the target's Sp. Def by 1.
energyball.name: Energy Ball

eternabeam.desc: Unless the target faints, the user must rest on the next turn.
eternabeam.shortDesc: Unless the target faints, the user must rest on the next turn.
eternabeam.name: Eternabeam

extrasensory.name: Extrasensory
extrasensory.desc: Has a 10% chance to make the target flinch.
extrasensory.shortDesc: 10% chance to make the target flinch.

fairylock.name: Fairy Lock
fairylock.desc: Prevents all active Pokemon from switching next turn. A Pokemon can still switch out if it is holding Shed Shell or uses Baton Pass, Flip Turn, Parting Shot, Teleport, U-turn, or Volt Switch. Fails if the effect is already active.
fairylock.shortDesc: Prevents all Pokemon from switching next turn.

falsesurrender.name: False Surrender
falsesurrender.desc: This move does not check accuracy.

paraboliccharge.shortDesc: User recovers 50% of the damage dealt.

perishsong.name: Perish Song
perishsong.desc: Each active Pokemon receives a perish count of 4 if it doesn't already have a perish count. At the end of each turn including the turn used, the perish count of all active Pokemon lowers by 1 and Pokemon faint if the number reaches 0. The perish count is removed from Pokemon that switch out. If a Pokemon uses Baton Pass while it has a perish count, the replacement will gain the perish count and continue to count down.
perishsong.shortDesc: All active Pokemon will faint in 3 turns.

petalblizzard.name: Petal Blizzard
petalblizzard.shortDesc: No additional effect. Hits adjacent Pokemon.

photongeyser.desc: Has a 20% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by 1 stage.
photongeyser.shortDesc: 20% chance to lower the target's Sp. Def by 1.
photongeyser.name: Photon Geyser

pinmissile.name: Pin Missile
pinmissile.desc: Hits two to five times. Has a 35% chance to hit two or three times and a 15% chance to hit four or five times. If one of the hits breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the remaining hits. If the user has the Skill Link Ability, this move will always hit five times.

plasmafists.desc: If this move is successful, it has 100% chance to causes Normal-type moves to become Electric type this turn.
plasmafists.shortDesc: 100% to make Normal moves become Electric type this turn.
plasmafists.name: Plasma Fists

playnice.name: Play Nice
playnice.desc: Lowers the target's Attack by 1 stage.

poisonfang.desc: Has a 30% chance to badly poison the target.
poisonfang.shortDesc: 30% chance to badly poison the target.
poisonfang.name: Poison Fang

poisonsting.name: Poison Sting
poisonsting.desc: Has a 30% chance to poison the target.

poisontail.name: Poison Tail
poisontail.desc: Has a 10% chance to poison the target and a higher chance for a critical hit.
poisontail.shortDesc: High critical hit ratio. 10% chance to poison.

pollenpuff.name: Pollen Puff
pollenpuff.desc: If the target is an ally, this move restores 1/2 of its maximum HP, rounded down, instead of dealing damage.
pollenpuff.shortDesc: If the target is an ally, heals 50% of its max HP.

poweruppunch.name: Power-Up Punch
poweruppunch.desc: Has a 100% chance to raise the user's Attack by 1 stage.
poweruppunch.shortDesc: 100% chance to raise the user's Attack by 1.

precipiceblades.name: Precipice Blades
precipiceblades.shortDesc: No additional effect. Hits adjacent foes.

prismaticlaser.name: Prismatic Laser
prismaticlaser.desc: If this move is successful, the user must recharge on the following turn and cannot select a move.

psychic.desc: Has a 20% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by 1 stage.
psychic.shortDesc: 20% chance to lower the target's Sp. Def by 1.
psychic.name: Psychic

psychicfangs.name: Psychic Fangs
psychicfangs.desc: If this attack does not miss, the effects of Reflect, Light Screen, and Aurora Veil end for the target's side of the field before damage is calculated.
psychicfangs.shortDesc: Destroys screens, unless the target is immune.

psychoshift.name: Psycho Shift
psychoshift.desc: The user's non-volatile status condition is transferred to the target, and the user is then cured. Fails if the user has no non-volatile status condition or if the target already has one.
psychoshift.shortDesc: Transfers the user's status ailment to the target.

psywave.name: Psywave
psywave.desc: Deals damage to the target equal to (user's level) * (X + 50) / 100, where X is a random number from 0 to 100, rounded down, but not less than 1 HP.
psywave.shortDesc: Random damage equal to 0.5x-1.5x user's level.

purify.name: Purify
purify.desc: The target is cured if it has a non-volatile status condition. If the target was cured, the user restores 1/2 of its maximum HP, rounded down.
purify.shortDesc: Cures target's status; heals user 1/2 max HP if so.

pyroball.name: Pyro Ball
pyroball.desc: Has a 10% chance to burn the target.
pyroball.shortDesc: 10% chance to burn the target. Thaws user.

rage.name: Rage
rage.desc: Once this move is successfully used, the user's Attack is raised by 1 stage every time it is hit by another Pokemon's attack as long as this move is chosen for use.
rage.shortDesc: Raises the user's Attack by 1 if hit during use.

ragepowder.name: Rage Powder
ragepowder.desc: Until the end of the turn, all single-target attacks from the opposing side are redirected to the user. Such attacks are redirected to the user before they can be reflected by Magic Coat or the Magic Bounce Ability, or drawn in by the Lightning Rod or Storm Drain Abilities. Fails if it is not a Double Battle or Battle Royal. This effect is ignored while the user is under the effect of Sky Drop.
ragepowder.shortDesc: The foes' moves target the user on the turn used.

rapidspin.name: Rapid Spin
rapidspin.desc: If this move is successful and the user has not fainted, the effects of Leech Seed and binding moves end for the user, and all hazards are removed from the user's side of the field. Has a 100% chance to raise the user's Speed by 1 stage.
rapidspin.shortDesc: Free user from hazards/bind/Leech Seed; +1 Spe.

razorshell.name: Razor Shell
razorshell.desc: Has a 50% chance to lower the target's Defense by 1 stage.
razorshell.shortDesc: 50% chance to lower the target's Defense by 1.

razorwind.name: Razor Wind
razorwind.desc: Has a higher chance for a critical hit. This attack charges on the first turn and executes on the second. If the user is holding a Power Herb, the move completes in one turn.
razorwind.shortDesc: Charges, then hits foe(s) turn 2. High crit ratio.

recycle.name: Recycle
recycle.desc: The user regains the item it last used. Fails if the user is holding an item, if the user has not held an item, if the item was a popped Air Balloon, if the item was picked up by a Pokemon with the Pickup Ability, or if the item was lost to Bug Bite, Corrosive Gas, Covet, Incinerate, Knock Off, Pluck, or Thief. Items thrown with Fling can be regained.
recycle.shortDesc: Restores the item the user last used.

relicsong.desc: Has a 30% chance to cause the target to fall asleep. If this move is successful on at least one target and the user is a Meloetta, it changes to Pirouette Forme if it is currently in Aria Forme, or changes to Aria Forme if it is currently in Pirouette Forme. This forme change does not happen if the Meloetta has the Sheer Force Ability. The Pirouette Forme reverts to Aria Forme when Meloetta is not active.
relicsong.shortDesc: 30% chance to sleep foe(s). Meloetta transforms.
relicsong.name: Relic Song

retaliate.name: Retaliate
retaliate.desc: Power doubles if one of the user's party members fainted last turn.
retaliate.shortDesc: Power doubles if an ally fainted last turn.

revelationdance.name: Revelation Dance
revelationdance.desc: This move's type depends on the user's primary type. If the user's primary type is typeless, this move's type is the user's secondary type if it has one, otherwise the added type from Forest's Curse or Trick-or-Treat. This move is typeless if the user's type is typeless alone.
revelationdance.shortDesc: Type varies based on the user's primary type.

roar.name: Roar
roar.desc: The target is forced to switch out and be replaced with a random unfainted ally. Fails if the target is the last unfainted Pokemon in its party, or if the target used Ingrain previously or has the Suction Cups Ability.
roar.shortDesc: Forces the target to switch to a random ally.

rockclimb.name: Rock Climb
rockclimb.desc: Has a 20% chance to confuse the target.

rocksmash.desc: Has a 80% chance to lower the target's Defense by 1 stage.
rocksmash.shortDesc: 80% chance to lower the target's Defense by 1.
rocksmash.name: Rock Smash

rocktomb.name: Rock Tomb
rocktomb.desc: Has a 100% chance to lower the target's Speed by 1 stage.
rocktomb.shortDesc: 100% chance to lower the target's Speed by 1.

rollingkick.desc: Has a 35% chance to make the target flinch.
rollingkick.shortDesc: 35% chance to make the target flinch.
rollingkick.name: Rolling Kick

sandtomb.name: Sand Tomb
sandtomb.desc: Prevents the target from switching for four or five turns (seven turns if the user is holding Grip Claw). Causes damage to the target equal to 1/8 of its maximum HP (1/6 if the user is holding Binding Band), rounded down, at the end of each turn during effect. The target can still switch out if it is holding Shed Shell or uses Baton Pass, Flip Turn, Parting Shot, Shed Tail, Teleport, U-turn, or Volt Switch. The effect ends if either the user or the target leaves the field, or if the target uses Mortal Spin, Rapid Spin, or Substitute successfully. This effect is not stackable or reset by using this or another binding move.
sandtomb.shortDesc: Traps and damages the target for 4-5 turns.

scaryface.name: Scary Face
scaryface.desc: Lowers the target's Speed by 2 stages.

screech.name: Screech
screech.desc: Lowers the target's Defense by 2 stages.

shadowbone.desc: Has a 16% chance to lower the target's Defense by 1 stage.
shadowbone.shortDesc: 16% chance to lower the target's Defense by 1.
shadowbone.name: Shadow Bone

shadowpunch.desc: This move does not check accuracy. If this move is successful, it breaks through the target's Baneful Bunker, Detect, King's Shield, Protect, or Spiky Shield for this turn, allowing other Pokemon to attack the target normally. If the target's side is protected by Crafty Shield, Mat Block, Quick Guard, or Wide Guard, that protection is also broken for this turn and other Pokemon may attack the target's side normally.
shadowpunch.shortDesc: Does not check accuracy. Nullifies Detect, Protect, and Quick/Wide Guard.
shadowpunch.name: Shadow Punch

shoreup.name: Shore Up
shoreup.desc: The user restores 1/2 of its maximum HP, rounded half down. If the weather is Sandstorm, the user instead restores 2/3 of its maximum HP, rounded half down.
shoreup.shortDesc: User restores 1/2 its max HP; 2/3 in Sandstorm.

silverwind.desc: Has a 15% chance to raise the user's Attack, Defense, Special Attack, Special Defense, and Speed by 1 stage.
silverwind.shortDesc: 15% chance to raise all stats by 1 (not acc/eva).
silverwind.name: Silver Wind

sing.name: Sing
sing.desc: Causes the target to fall asleep.
sing.shortDesc: Causes the target to fall asleep.

sketch.name: Sketch
sketch.desc: This move is permanently replaced by the last move used by the target. The copied move has the maximum PP for that move. Fails if the target has not made a move, if the user has Transformed, or if the move is Chatter, Sketch, Struggle, or any move the user knows.
sketch.shortDesc: Permanently copies the last move target used.

skullbash.name: Skull Bash
skullbash.desc: This attack charges on the first turn and executes on the second. Raises the user's Defense by 1 stage on the first turn. If the user is holding a Power Herb, the move completes in one turn.
skullbash.shortDesc: Raises user's Defense by 1 on turn 1. Hits turn 2.

skyattack.desc: Has a 35% chance to make the target flinch and a higher chance for a critical hit. This attack charges on the first turn and executes on the second. If the user is holding a Power Herb, the move completes in one turn.
skyattack.shortDesc: Charges, then hits turn 2. 35% flinch. High crit.
skyattack.name: Sky Attack

smartstrike.name: Smart Strike
smartstrike.desc: This move does not check accuracy.
smartstrike.shortDesc: This move does not check accuracy.

snaptrap.name: Snap Trap
snaptrap.desc: Prevents the target from switching for four or five turns (seven turns if the user is holding Grip Claw). Causes damage to the target equal to 1/8 of its maximum HP (1/6 if the user is holding Binding Band), rounded down, at the end of each turn during effect. The target can still switch out if it is holding Shed Shell or uses Baton Pass, Flip Turn, Parting Shot, Shed Tail, Teleport, U-turn, or Volt Switch. The effect ends if either the user or the target leaves the field, or if the target uses Mortal Spin, Rapid Spin, or Substitute successfully. This effect is not stackable or reset by using this or another binding move.
snaptrap.shortDesc: Traps and damages the target for 4-5 turns.

snarl.name: Snarl
snarl.desc: Has a 100% chance to lower the target's Special Attack by 1 stage.
snarl.shortDesc: 100% chance to lower the foe(s) Sp. Atk by 1.

snipeshot.desc: Ignores the target's stat stage changes, including evasiveness.
snipeshot.shortDesc: Ignores the target's stat stage changes.
snipeshot.name: Snipe Shot

snore.name: Snore
snore.desc: Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch. Fails if the user is not asleep.
snore.shortDesc: User must be asleep. 30% chance to flinch target.

soak.desc: This move does not check accuracy. Causes the target to become a Water type. Fails if the target is an Arceus or a Silvally, if the target is already purely Water type, or if the target is Terastallized.
soak.shortDesc: Does not check acc. Changes the target's type to Water.
soak.name: Soak

solarbeam.name: Solar Beam
solarbeam.desc: This attack charges on the first turn and executes on the second. Power is halved if the weather is Primordial Sea, Rain Dance, Sandstorm, or Snow and the user is not holding Utility Umbrella. If the user is holding a Power Herb or the weather is Desolate Land or Sunny Day, the move completes in one turn. If the user is holding Utility Umbrella and the weather is Desolate Land or Sunny Day, the move still requires a turn to charge.
solarbeam.shortDesc: Charges turn 1. Hits turn 2. No charge in sunlight.

sparklingaria.name: Sparkling Aria
sparklingaria.desc: If the user has not fainted, the target is cured of its burn.
sparklingaria.shortDesc: The target is cured of its burn.

spectralthief.desc: If the move succeeds, the user copies all of the target's current stat stage changes.
spectralthief.shortDesc: Copies the target's current stat stages on hit.
spectralthief.name: Spectral Thief

speedswap.name: Speed Swap
speedswap.desc: The user swaps its Speed stat with the target. Stat stage changes are unaffected.

spiderweb.name: Spider Web
spiderweb.desc: Prevents the target from switching out. The target can still switch out if it is holding Shed Shell or uses Baton Pass, Flip Turn, Parting Shot, Teleport, U-turn, or Volt Switch. If the target leaves the field using Baton Pass, the replacement will remain trapped. The effect ends if the user leaves the field.
spiderweb.shortDesc: Prevents the target from switching out.

spikecannon.desc: Has a higher chance for a critical hit. This move has Hits two to five times. Has a 35% chance to hit two or three times and a 15% chance to hit four or five times. If one of the hits breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the remaining hits. If the user has the Skill Link Ability, this move will always hit five times.
spikecannon.shortDesc: Hi crit ratio. Hits 2-5 times in one turn.
spikecannon.name: Spike Cannon

spikyshield.name: Spiky Shield
spikyshield.desc: The user is protected from most attacks made by other Pokemon during this turn, and Pokemon making contact with the user lose 1/8 of their maximum HP, rounded down. This move has a 1/X chance of being successful, where X starts at 1 and triples each time this move is successfully used. X resets to 1 if this move fails, if the user's last move used is not Baneful Bunker, Detect, Endure, King's Shield, Max Guard, Obstruct, Protect, Quick Guard, Silk Trap, Spiky Shield, or Wide Guard, or if it was one of those moves and the user's protection was broken. Fails if the user moves last this turn.
spikyshield.shortDesc: Protects from moves. Contact: loses 1/8 max HP.

spiritbreak.name: Spirit Break
spiritbreak.desc: Has a 100% chance to lower the target's Special Attack by 1 stage.
spiritbreak.shortDesc: 100% chance to lower the target's Sp. Atk by 1.

spiritshackle.desc: Prevents the target from switching for four or five turns (seven turns if the user is holding Grip Claw). Causes damage to the target equal to 1/8 of its maximum HP (1/6 if the user is holding Binding Band), rounded down, at the end of each turn during effect. The target can still switch out if it is holding Shed Shell or uses Baton Pass, Flip Turn, Parting Shot, Shed Tail, Teleport, U-turn, or Volt Switch. The effect ends if either the user or the target leaves the field, or if the target uses Mortal Spin, Rapid Spin, or Substitute successfully. This effect is not stackable or reset by using this or another binding move.
spiritshackle.shortDesc: Traps and damages the target for 4-5 turns.
spiritshackle.name: Spirit Shackle

spotlight.desc: Until the end of the turn, all single-target attacks from opponents of the target are redirected to the target. Such attacks are redirected to the target before they can be reflected by Magic Coat or the Magic Bounce Ability, or drawn in by the Lightning Rod or Storm Drain Abilities. Fails if it is not a Double Battle or Battle Royal. This move boosts the Special Defense of the target by 1 stage.
spotlight.shortDesc: Target's foes' Sp. Def is boosted by 1 and moves are redirected to it this turn.
spotlight.name: Spotlight

steameruption.name: Steam Eruption
steameruption.desc: Has a 30% chance to burn the target. The target thaws out if it is frozen.
steameruption.shortDesc: 30% chance to burn the target. Thaws target.

steelbeam.desc: If the target lost HP, the user takes recoil damage equal to 50% the HP lost by the target, rounded half up, but not less than 1 HP.
steelbeam.name: Steel Beam

steelwing.desc: Has a 25% chance to raise the user's Defense by 1 stage.
steelwing.shortDesc: 25% chance to raise the user's Defense by 1.
steelwing.name: Steel Wing

stomp.name: Stomp
stomp.desc: Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch. Damage doubles and no accuracy check is done if the target has used Minimize while active.
stomp.shortDesc: 30% chance to make the target flinch.

stompingtantrum.name: Stomping Tantrum
stompingtantrum.desc: Power doubles if the user's last move on the previous turn, including moves called by other moves or those used through Instruct, Magic Coat, Snatch, or the Dancer or Magic Bounce Abilities, failed to do any of its normal effects, not including damage from an unsuccessful High Jump Kick, Jump Kick, or Mind Blown, or if the user was prevented from moving by any effect other than recharging or Sky Drop. A move that was blocked by Baneful Bunker, Detect, King's Shield, Protect, Spiky Shield, Crafty Shield, Mat Block, Quick Guard, or Wide Guard will not double this move's power, nor will Bounce or Fly ending early due to the effect of Gravity, Smack Down, or Thousand Arrows.
stompingtantrum.shortDesc: Power doubles if the user's last move failed.

stormthrow.name: Storm Throw
stormthrow.desc: This move is always a critical hit unless the target is under the effect of Lucky Chant or has the Battle Armor or Shell Armor Abilities.
stormthrow.shortDesc: Always results in a critical hit.

strangesteam.name: Strange Steam
strangesteam.desc: Has a 20% chance to confuse the target.

strengthsap.name: Strength Sap
strengthsap.desc: Lowers the target's Attack by 1 stage. The user restores its HP equal to the target's Attack stat calculated with its stat stage before this move was used. If Big Root is held by the user, the HP recovered is 1.3x normal, rounded half down. Fails if the target's Attack stat stage is -6.
strengthsap.shortDesc: User heals HP=target's Atk stat. Lowers Atk by 1.

stringshot.desc: Lowers the target's Speed by 1 stage.
stringshot.name: String Shot

strugglebug.name: Struggle Bug
strugglebug.desc: Has a 100% chance to lower the target's Special Attack by 1 stage.
strugglebug.shortDesc: 100% chance to lower the foe(s) Sp. Atk by 1.

submission.name: Submission
submission.desc: If the target lost HP, the user takes recoil damage equal to 1/4 the HP lost by the target, rounded half up, but not less than 1 HP.

suckerpunch.name: Sucker Punch
suckerpunch.desc: Fails if the target did not select a physical attack, special attack, or Me First for use this turn, or if the target moves before the user.
suckerpunch.shortDesc: Usually goes first. Fails if target is not attacking.

sunsteelstrike.desc: Has a 26% chance to burn the target.
sunsteelstrike.name: Sunsteel Strike

supersonic.name: Supersonic
supersonic.desc: Causes the target to become confused.
supersonic.shortDesc: Causes the target to become confused.

swagger.name: Swagger
swagger.desc: Raises the target's Attack by 2 stages and confuses it.
swagger.shortDesc: Raises the target's Attack by 2 and confuses it.

swallow.name: Swallow
swallow.desc: The user restores its HP based on its Stockpile count. Restores 1/4 of its maximum HP if it's 1, 1/2 of its maximum HP if it's 2, both rounded half down, and all of its HP if it's 3. Fails if the user's Stockpile count is 0. The user's Defense and Special Defense decrease by as many stages as Stockpile had increased them, and the user's Stockpile count resets to 0.
swallow.shortDesc: Heals the user based on uses of Stockpile.

sweetkiss.name: Sweet Kiss
sweetkiss.desc: Causes the target to become confused.
sweetkiss.shortDesc: Causes the target to become confused.

sweetscent.desc: Lowers the target's evasiveness by 1 stage.
sweetscent.name: Sweet Scent

synchronoise.name: Synchronoise
synchronoise.desc: The target is immune if it does not share a type with the user.
synchronoise.shortDesc: Hits adjacent Pokemon sharing the user's type.

tailslap.name: Tail Slap
tailslap.desc: Hits two to five times. Has a 35% chance to hit two or three times and a 15% chance to hit four or five times. If one of the hits breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the remaining hits. If the user has the Skill Link Ability, this move will always hit five times.

tarshot.name: Tar Shot
tarshot.desc: Lowers the target's Speed by 1 stage. Until the target switches out, the effectiveness of Fire-type moves is doubled against it.
tarshot.shortDesc: Target gets -1 Spe and becomes weaker to Fire.

tearfullook.name: Tearful Look
tearfullook.desc: Lowers the target's Attack and Special Attack by 1 stage.
tearfullook.shortDesc: Lowers the target's Attack and Sp. Atk by 1.

teatime.name: Teatime
teatime.desc: All active Pokemon consume their held Berries. This effect is not prevented by substitutes, the Klutz or Unnerve Abilities, or the effects of Embargo or Magic Room. Fails if no active Pokemon is holding a Berry.
teatime.shortDesc: All active Pokemon consume held Berries.

teleport.name: Teleport
teleport.desc: If this move is successful and the user has not fainted, the user switches out even if it is trapped and is replaced immediately by a selected party member. The user does not switch out if there are no unfainted party members.

thunder.name: Thunder
thunder.desc: Has a 30% chance to paralyze the target. This move can hit a target using Bounce, Fly, or Sky Drop, or is under the effect of Sky Drop. If the weather is Primordial Sea or Rain Dance, this move does not check accuracy. If the weather is Desolate Land or Sunny Day, this move's accuracy is 50%. If this move is used against a Pokemon holding Utility Umbrella, this move's accuracy remains at 70%.
thunder.shortDesc: 30% chance to paralyze. Can't miss in rain.

thunderbolt.name: Thunderbolt
thunderbolt.desc: Has a 10% chance to paralyze the target.

thunderouskick.name: Thunderous Kick
thunderouskick.desc: Has a 100% chance to lower the target's Defense by 1 stage.
thunderouskick.shortDesc: 100% chance to lower the target's Defense by 1.

thunderpunch.desc: Has a 11% chance to paralyze the target.
thunderpunch.name: Thunder Punch

topsyturvy.name: Topsy-Turvy
topsyturvy.desc: The target's positive stat stages become negative and vice versa. Fails if all of the target's stat stages are 0.

toxicthread.name: Toxic Thread
toxicthread.desc: Lowers the target's Speed by 1 stage and poisons it.
toxicthread.shortDesc: Lowers the target's Speed by 1 and poisons it.

triattack.desc: Has a 22% chance to either burn, freeze, or paralyze the target.
triattack.shortDesc: 22% chance to paralyze or burn or freeze target.
triattack.name: Tri Attack

trick.name: Trick
trick.desc: The user swaps its held item with the target's held item. Fails if either the user or the target is holding a Mail or Z-Crystal, if neither is holding an item, if the user is trying to give or take a Mega Stone to or from the species that can Mega Evolve with it, or if the user is trying to give or take a Blue Orb, a Red Orb, a Griseous Orb, a Plate, a Drive, or a Memory to or from a Kyogre, a Groudon, a Giratina, an Arceus, a Genesect, or a Silvally, respectively. The target is immune to this move if it has the Sticky Hold Ability.
trick.shortDesc: User switches its held item with the target's.

trickortreat.name: Trick-or-Treat
trickortreat.desc: Causes the Ghost type to be added to the target, effectively making it have two or three types. Fails if the target is already a Ghost type. If Forest's Curse adds a type to the target, it replaces the type added by this move and vice versa.
trickortreat.shortDesc: Adds Ghost to the target's type(s).

triplekick.name: Triple Kick
triplekick.desc: Hits three times. Power increases to 20 for the second hit and 30 for the third. This move checks accuracy for each hit, and the attack ends if the target avoids a hit. If one of the hits breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the remaining hits. If the user has the Skill Link Ability, this move will always hit three times.
triplekick.shortDesc: Hits 3 times. Each hit can miss, but power rises.

tropkick.name: Trop Kick
tropkick.desc: Has a 100% chance to lower the target's Attack by 1 stage.
tropkick.shortDesc: 100% chance to lower the target's Attack by 1.

twineedle.desc: Hits twice, with each hit having a 30% chance to poison the target. If the first hit breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the second hit.
twineedle.shortDesc: Hits 2 times. Each hit has 30% chance to poison.
twineedle.name: Twineedle

waterfall.name: Waterfall

waterpledge.desc: Has a 100% chance to trigger Rainbow.

waterspout.desc: Power is equal to (user's current HP * 150 / user's maximum HP), rounded down, but not less than 1.
waterspout.shortDesc: Less power as user's HP decreases. Hits foe(s).

whirlpool.name: Whirlpool

The target can still switch out if it is holding Shed Shell or uses Baton Pass, Flip Turn, Parting Shot, Shed Tail, Teleport, U-turn, or Volt Switch. The effect ends if either the user or the target leaves the field, or if the target uses Mortal Spin, Rapid Spin, or Substitute successfully. This effect is not stackable or reset by using this or another binding move.
whirlpool.shortDesc: Traps and damages the target for 4-5 turns.

whirlwind.name: Whirlwind
whirlwind.desc: The target is forced to switch out and be replaced with a random unfainted ally. Fails if the target is the last unfainted Pokemon in its party, or if the target used Ingrain previously or has the Suction Cups Ability.
whirlwind.shortDesc: Forces the target to switch to a random ally.

wildcharge.name: Wild Charge
wildcharge.desc: If the target lost HP, the user takes recoil damage equal to 1/4 the HP lost by the target, rounded half up, but not less than 1 HP.

wrap.name: Wrap
wrap.desc: Prevents the target from switching for four or five turns (seven turns if the user is holding Grip Claw). Causes damage to the target equal to 1/8 of its maximum HP (1/6 if the user is holding Binding Band), rounded down, at the end of each turn during effect. The target can still switch out if it is holding Shed Shell or uses Baton Pass, Flip Turn, Parting Shot, Shed Tail, Teleport, U-turn, or Volt Switch. The effect ends if either the user or the target leaves the field, or if the target uses Mortal Spin, Rapid Spin, or Substitute successfully. This effect is not stackable or reset by using this or another binding move.
wrap.shortDesc: Traps and damages the target for 4-5 turns.

zenheadbutt.name: Zen Headbutt
zenheadbutt.desc: Has a 20% chance to make the target flinch.
zenheadbutt.shortDesc: 20% chance to make the target flinch.

lowkick.name: Low Kick
lowkick.desc: This move's power is 20 if the target weighs less than 10 kg, 40 if less than 25 kg, 60 if less than 50 kg, 80 if less than 100 kg, 100 if less than 200 kg, and 120 if greater than or equal to 200 kg.
lowkick.shortDesc: More power the heavier the target.

blazekick.name: Blaze Kick
blazekick.desc: Has a 10% chance to burn the target and a higher chance for a critical hit.
blazekick.shortDesc: High critical hit ratio. 10% chance to burn.

electroweb.name: Electroweb
electroweb.desc: Has a 100% chance to lower the target's Speed by 1 stage.
electroweb.shortDesc: 100% chance to lower the foe(s) Speed by 1.

stickyweb.name: Sticky Web
stickyweb.desc: Sets up a hazard on the opposing side of the field, lowering the Speed by 1 stage of each opposing Pokemon that switches in, unless it is a Flying-type Pokemon or has the Levitate Ability. Fails if the effect is already active on the opposing side. Can be removed from the opposing side if any opposing Pokemon uses Mortal Spin, Rapid Spin, or Defog successfully, or is hit by Defog.
stickyweb.shortDesc: Lowers Speed of grounded foes by 1 on switch-in.

nightslash.name: Night Slash
nightslash.desc: Has a higher chance for a critical hit.

sacredsword.name: Sacred Sword
sacredsword.desc: Ignores the target's stat stage changes, including evasiveness.
sacredsword.shortDesc: Ignores the target's stat stage changes.

secretsword.name: Secret Sword
secretsword.desc: Deals damage to the target based on its Defense instead of Special Defense.
secretsword.shortDesc: Damages target based on Defense, not Sp. Def.

leafblade.name: Leaf Blade
leafblade.desc: Has a higher chance for a critical hit.

falseswipe.name: False Swipe
falseswipe.desc: Leaves the target with at least 1 HP.
falseswipe.shortDesc: Always leaves the target with at least 1 HP.

slash.name: Slash
slash.desc: Has a higher chance for a critical hit.

psychocut.name: Psycho Cut
psychocut.desc: Has a higher chance for a critical hit.

beakblast.name: Beak Blast
beakblast.desc: If the user is hit by a contact move this turn before it can execute this move, the attacker is burned.
beakblast.shortDesc: Burns on contact with the user before it moves.

boltbeak.name: Bolt Beak
boltbeak.desc: Power doubles if the user moves before the target.
boltbeak.shortDesc: Power doubles if user moves before the target.

bugbite.name: Bug Bite
bugbite.desc: If this move is successful and the user has not fainted, it steals the target's held Berry if it is holding one and eats it immediately, gaining its effects even if the user's item is being ignored. Items lost to this move cannot be regained with Recycle or the Harvest Ability.
bugbite.shortDesc: User steals and eats the target's Berry.

sunnyday.name: Sunny Day
sunnyday.desc: For 5 turns, the weather becomes Sunny Day. The damage of Fire-type attacks is multiplied by 1.5 and the damage of Water-type attacks is multiplied by 0.5 during the effect. Lasts for 8 turns if the user is holding Heat Rock. Fails if the current weather is Sunny Day.
sunnyday.shortDesc: For 5 turns, intense sunlight powers Fire moves.

solarblade.name: Solar Blade
solarblade.desc: This attack charges on the first turn and executes on the second. Power is halved if the weather is Hail, Primordial Sea, Rain Dance, or Sandstorm and the user is not holding Utility Umbrella. If the user is holding a Power Herb or the weather is Desolate Land or Sunny Day, the move completes in one turn. If the user is holding Utility Umbrella and the weather is Desolate Land or Sunny Day, the move still requires a turn to charge.
solarblade.shortDesc: Charges turn 1. Hits turn 2. No charge in sunlight.

rockslide.name: Rock Slide
rockslide.desc: Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.
rockslide.shortDesc: 30% chance to make the foe(s) flinch.

dracometeor.name: Draco Meteor
dracometeor.desc: Lowers the user's Special Attack by 2 stages.
dracometeor.shortDesc: Lowers the user's Sp. Atk by 2.

fusionflare.name: Fusion Flare
fusionflare.desc: Power doubles if the last move used by any Pokemon this turn was Fusion Bolt.
fusionflare.shortDesc: Power doubles if used after Fusion Bolt this turn.

smackdown.name: Smack Down
smackdown.desc: This move can hit a target using Bounce, Fly, or Sky Drop, or is under the effect of Sky Drop. If this move hits a target under the effect of Bounce, Fly, Magnet Rise, or Telekinesis, the effect ends. If the target is a Flying type that has not used Roost this turn or a Pokemon with the Levitate Ability, it loses its immunity to Ground-type attacks and the Arena Trap Ability as long as it remains active. During the effect, Magnet Rise fails for the target and Telekinesis fails against the target.

mountaingale.name: Mountain Gale
mountaingale.desc: Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.
mountaingale.shortDesc: 30% chance to make the target flinch.

meteorcrash.name: Meteor Crash
meteorcrash.desc: The user also takes damage and may burn the target.
meteorcrash.shortDesc: The user also takes damage and may burn the target.

magicpowder.name: Magic Powder
magicpowder.desc: Causes the target to become a Psychic type. Fails if the target is an Arceus or a Silvally, if the target is already purely Psychic type, or if the target is Terastallized.
magicpowder.shortDesc: Changes the target's type to Psychic.

powder.name: Powder
powder.desc: If the target uses a Fire-type move this turn, it is prevented from executing and the target loses 1/4 of its maximum HP, rounded half up. This effect does not happen if the Fire-type move is prevented by Primordial Sea.
powder.shortDesc: If using a Fire move, target loses 1/4 max HP.

zingzap.desc: Has a 25% chance to make the target flinch.
zingzap.shortDesc: 25% chance to make the target flinch.
zingzap.name: Zing Zap

autotomize.name: Autotomize
autotomize.desc: Raises the user's Speed by 2 stages. If the user's Speed was changed, the user's weight is reduced by 100 kg as long as it remains active. This effect is stackable but cannot reduce the user's weight to less than 0.1 kg.
autotomize.shortDesc: Raises the user's Speed by 2; user loses 100 kg.

barrier.name: Barrier
barrier.desc: Raises the user's Defense by 2 stages.

bestow.name: Bestow
bestow.desc: The target receives the user's held item. Fails if the user has no item or is holding a Mail or Z-Crystal, if the target is already holding an item, if the user is a Kyogre holding a Blue Orb, a Groudon holding a Red Orb, a Giratina holding a Griseous Orb, an Arceus holding a Plate, a Genesect holding a Drive, a Silvally holding a Memory, a Pokemon that can Mega Evolve holding the Mega Stone for its species, or if the target is one of those Pokemon and the user is holding the respective item.
bestow.shortDesc: User passes its held item to the target.

blizzard.name: Blizzard
blizzard.desc: Has a 10% chance to freeze the target. If the weather is Snow, this move does not check accuracy.
blizzard.shortDesc: 10% chance to freeze foe(s). Can't miss in Snow.

bugbuzz.name: Bug Buzz
bugbuzz.desc: Has a 10% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by 1 stage.
bugbuzz.shortDesc: 10% chance to lower the target's Sp. Def by 1.

camouflage.name: Camouflage
camouflage.desc: The user's type changes based on the battle terrain. Normal type on the regular Wi-Fi terrain, Electric type during Electric Terrain, Fairy type during Misty Terrain, Grass type during Grassy Terrain, and Psychic type during Psychic Terrain. Fails if the user's type cannot be changed or if the user is already purely that type.
camouflage.shortDesc: Changes user's type by terrain (default Normal).

chatter.name: Chatter
chatter.desc: Has a 100% chance to confuse the target.

cottonspore.name: Cotton Spore
cottonspore.desc: Lowers the target's Speed by 2 stages.

covet.name: Covet
covet.desc: If this attack was successful and the user has not fainted, it steals the target's held item if the user is not holding one. The target's item is not stolen if it is a Mail or Z-Crystal, or if the target is a Kyogre holding a Blue Orb, a Groudon holding a Red Orb, a Giratina holding a Griseous Orb, an Arceus holding a Plate, a Genesect holding a Drive, a Silvally holding a Memory, or a Pokemon that can Mega Evolve holding the Mega Stone for its species. Items lost to this move cannot be regained with Recycle or the Harvest Ability.
covet.shortDesc: If the user has no item, it steals the target's.

defog.name: Defog
defog.desc: Lowers the target's evasiveness by 1 stage. If this move is successful and whether or not the target's evasiveness was affected, the effects of Reflect, Light Screen, Aurora Veil, Safeguard, Mist, Spikes, Toxic Spikes, Stealth Rock, and Sticky Web end for the target's side, and the effects of Spikes, Toxic Spikes, Stealth Rock, and Sticky Web end for the user's side. Ignores a target's substitute, although a substitute will still block the lowering of evasiveness. If there is a terrain active and this move is successful, the terrain will be cleared.
defog.shortDesc: -1 evasion; clears terrain and hazards on both sides.

drainpunch.name: Drain Punch
drainpunch.desc: The user recovers 1/2 the HP lost by the target, rounded half up. If Big Root is held by the user, the HP recovered is 1.3x normal, rounded half down.
drainpunch.shortDesc: User recovers 50% of the damage dealt.

dreameater.name: Dream Eater
dreameater.desc: The target is unaffected by this move unless it is asleep. The user recovers 1/2 the HP lost by the target, rounded half up. If Big Root is held by the user, the HP recovered is 1.3x normal, rounded half down.
dreameater.shortDesc: User gains 1/2 HP inflicted. Sleeping target only.

electroball.name: Electro Ball
electroball.desc: The power of this move depends on (user's current Speed / target's current Speed), rounded down. Power is equal to 150 if the result is 4 or more, 120 if 3, 80 if 2, 60 if 1, 40 if less than 1. If the target's current Speed is 0, this move's power is 40.
electroball.shortDesc: More power the faster the user is than the target.

fireblast.name: Fire Blast
fireblast.desc: Has a 10% chance to burn the target.

futuresight.name: Future Sight
futuresight.desc: Deals damage two turns after this move is used. At the end of that turn, the damage is calculated at that time and dealt to the Pokemon at the position the target had when the move was used. If the user is no longer active at the time, damage is calculated based on the user's natural Special Attack stat, types, and level, with no boosts from its held item or Ability. Fails if this move or Doom Desire is already in effect for the target's position.
futuresight.shortDesc: Hits two turns after being used.

growth.name: Growth
growth.desc: Raises the user's Attack and Special Attack by 1 stage. If the weather is Sunny Day or Desolate Land, this move raises the user's Attack and Special Attack by 2 stages. If the user is holding Utility Umbrella, this move will only raise the user's Attack and Special Attack by 1 stage, even if the weather is Sunny Day or Desolate Land.
growth.shortDesc: Raises user's Attack and Sp. Atk by 1; 2 in Sun.

gyroball.name: Gyro Ball
gyroball.desc: Power is equal to (25 * target's current Speed / user's current Speed) + 1, rounded down, but not more than 150. If the user's current Speed is 0, this move's power is 1.
gyroball.shortDesc: More power the slower the user than the target.

healbell.name: Heal Bell
healbell.desc: Every Pokemon in the user's party is cured of its non-volatile status condition. Active Pokemon with the Soundproof Ability are not cured, unless they are the user.
healbell.shortDesc: Cures the user's party of all status conditions.

healpulse.name: Heal Pulse
healpulse.desc: The target restores 1/2 of its maximum HP, rounded half up. If the user has the Mega Launcher Ability, the target instead restores 3/4 of its maximum HP, rounded half down.
healpulse.shortDesc: Heals the target by 50% of its max HP.

heatwave.name: Heat Wave
heatwave.desc: Has a 10% chance to burn the target.

hiddenpower.name: Hidden Power
hiddenpower.desc: This move's type depends on the user's individual values (IVs), and can be any type but Fairy and Normal.
hiddenpower.shortDesc: Varies in type based on the user's IVs.

hornleech.name: Horn Leech
hornleech.desc: The user recovers 1/2 the HP lost by the target, rounded half up. If Big Root is held by the user, the HP recovered is 1.3x normal, rounded half down.
hornleech.shortDesc: User recovers 50% of the damage dealt.

hypervoice.name: Hyper Voice
hypervoice.shortDesc: No additional effect. Hits adjacent foes.

leafstorm.name: Leaf Storm
leafstorm.desc: Lowers the user's Special Attack by 2 stages.
leafstorm.shortDesc: Lowers the user's Sp. Atk by 2.

lowsweep.name: Low Sweep
lowsweep.desc: Has a 100% chance to lower the target's Speed by 1 stage.
lowsweep.shortDesc: 100% chance to lower the target's Speed by 1.

metalsound.name: Metal Sound
metalsound.desc: Lowers the target's Special Defense by 2 stages.
metalsound.shortDesc: Lowers the target's Sp. Def by 2.

minimize.name: Minimize
minimize.desc: Raises the user's evasiveness by 2 stages. Whether or not the user's evasiveness was changed, Body Slam, Dragon Rush, Flying Press, Heat Crash, Heavy Slam, Malicious Moonsault, Steamroller, and Stomp will not check accuracy and have their damage doubled if used against the user while it is active.

muddywater.name: Muddy Water
muddywater.desc: Has a 30% chance to lower the target's accuracy by 1 stage.
muddywater.shortDesc: 30% chance to lower the foe(s) accuracy by 1.

naturepower.name: Nature Power
naturepower.desc: This move calls another move for use based on the battle terrain. Tri Attack on the regular Wi-Fi terrain, Thunderbolt during Electric Terrain, Moonblast during Misty Terrain, Energy Ball during Grassy Terrain, and Psychic during Psychic Terrain.
naturepower.shortDesc: Attack depends on terrain (default Tri Attack).

overheat.name: Overheat
overheat.desc: Lowers the user's Special Attack by 2 stages.
overheat.shortDesc: Lowers the user's Sp. Atk by 2.

psychup.name: Psych Up
psychup.desc: The user copies all of the target's current stat stage changes.
psychup.shortDesc: Copies the target's current stat stages.

quickguard.name: Quick Guard
quickguard.desc: The user and its party members are protected from attacks with original or altered priority greater than 0 made by other Pokemon, including allies, during this turn. This move modifies the same 1/X chance of being successful used by other protection moves, where X starts at 1 and triples each time this move is successfully used, but does not use the chance to check for failure. X resets to 1 if this move fails, if the user's last move used is not Baneful Bunker, Detect, Endure, King's Shield, Max Guard, Obstruct, Protect, Quick Guard, Silk Trap, Spiky Shield, or Wide Guard, or if it was one of those moves and the user's protection was broken. Fails if the user moves last this turn or if this move is already in effect for the user's side.
quickguard.shortDesc: Protects allies from priority attacks this turn.

reflect.name: Reflect
reflect.desc: For 5 turns, the user and its party members take 0.5x damage from physical attacks, or 0.66x damage if in a Double Battle. Damage is not reduced further with Aurora Veil. Critical hits ignore this effect. It is removed from the user's side if the user or an ally is successfully hit by Brick Break, Psychic Fangs, or Defog. Lasts for 8 turns if the user is holding Light Clay. Fails if the effect is already active on the user's side.
reflect.shortDesc: For 5 turns, physical damage to allies is halved.

round.name: Round
round.desc: If there are other active Pokemon that chose this move for use this turn, those Pokemon take their turn immediately after the user, in Speed order, and this move's power is 120 for each other user.
round.shortDesc: Power doubles if others used Round this turn.

scald.name: Scald
scald.desc: Has a 30% chance to burn the target. The target thaws out if it is frozen.
scald.shortDesc: 30% chance to burn the target. Thaws target.

secretpower.name: Secret Power
secretpower.desc: Has a 30% chance to cause a secondary effect on the target based on the battle terrain. Causes paralysis on the regular Wi-Fi terrain, causes paralysis during Electric Terrain, lowers Special Attack by 1 stage during Misty Terrain, causes sleep during Grassy Terrain and lowers Speed by 1 stage during Psychic Terrain.
secretpower.shortDesc: Effect varies with terrain. (30% paralysis chance)

skillswap.name: Skill Swap
skillswap.desc: The user swaps its Ability with the target's Ability. Fails if either the user or the target's Ability is As One, Battle Bond, Comatose, Commander, Disguise, Gulp Missile, Hadron Engine, Hunger Switch, Ice Face, Illusion, Multitype, Neutralizing Gas, Orichalcum Pulse, Power Construct, Protosynthesis, Quark Drive, RKS System, Schooling, Shields Down, Stance Change, Wonder Guard, Zen Mode, or Zero to Hero.
skillswap.shortDesc: The user and the target trade Abilities.

skydrop.name: Sky Drop
skydrop.desc: This attack takes the target into the air with the user on the first turn and executes on the second. Pokemon weighing 200 kg or more cannot be lifted. On the first turn, the user and the target avoid all attacks other than Gust, Hurricane, Sky Uppercut, Smack Down, Thousand Arrows, Thunder, and Twister. The user and the target cannot make a move between turns, but the target can select a move to use. This move cannot damage Flying-type Pokemon. Fails on the first turn if the target is an ally, if the target has a substitute, or if the target is using Bounce, Dig, Dive, Fly, Phantom Force, Shadow Force, or Sky Drop.
skydrop.shortDesc: User and foe fly up turn 1. Damages on turn 2.

sleeppowder.name: Sleep Powder
sleeppowder.desc: Causes the target to fall asleep.
sleeppowder.shortDesc: Causes the target to fall asleep.

smellingsalts.name: Smelling Salts
smellingsalts.desc: Power doubles if the target is paralyzed. If the user has not fainted, the target is cured of paralysis.
smellingsalts.shortDesc: Power doubles if target is paralyzed, and cures it.

smog.name: Smog
smog.desc: Has a 40% chance to poison the target.

spore.name: Spore
spore.desc: Causes the target to fall asleep.
spore.shortDesc: Causes the target to fall asleep.

substitute.name: Substitute
substitute.desc: The user takes 1/4 of its maximum HP, rounded down, and puts it into a substitute to take its place in battle. The substitute is removed once enough damage is inflicted on it, or if the user switches out or faints. Baton Pass can be used to transfer the substitute to an ally, and the substitute will keep its remaining HP. Until the substitute is broken, it receives damage from all attacks made by other Pokemon and shields the user from status effects and stat stage changes caused by other Pokemon. Sound-based moves and Pokemon with the Infiltrator Ability ignore substitutes. The user still takes normal damage from weather and status effects while behind its substitute. If the substitute breaks during a multi-hit attack, the user will take damage from any remaining hits. If a substitute is created while the user is trapped by a binding move, the binding effect ends immediately. Fails if the user does not have enough HP remaining to create a substitute without fainting, or if it already has a substitute.
substitute.shortDesc: User takes 1/4 its max HP to put in a substitute.

surf.name: Surf
surf.desc: Damage doubles if the target is using Dive.
surf.shortDesc: Hits adjacent Pokemon. Double damage on Dive.

swordsdance.name: Swords Dance
swordsdance.desc: Raises the user's Attack by 2 stages.

tailwind.name: Tailwind
tailwind.desc: For 4 turns, the user and its party members have their Speed doubled. Fails if this move is already in effect for the user's side.
tailwind.shortDesc: For 4 turns, allies' Speed is doubled.

toxic.name: Toxic
toxic.desc: Badly poisons the target. If a Poison-type Pokemon uses this move, the target cannot avoid the attack, even if the target is in the middle of a two-turn move.
toxic.shortDesc: Badly poisons the target. Poison types can't miss.

uproar.name: Uproar
uproar.desc: The user spends three turns locked into this move. This move targets an opponent at random on each turn. On the first of the three turns, all sleeping active Pokemon wake up. During the three turns, no active Pokemon can fall asleep by any means, and Pokemon switched in during the effect do not wake up. If the user is prevented from moving or the attack is not successful against the target during one of the turns, the effect ends.
uproar.shortDesc: Lasts 3 turns. Active Pokemon cannot fall asleep.

wakeupslap.name: Wake-Up Slap
wakeupslap.desc: Power doubles if the target is asleep. If the user has not fainted, the target wakes up.
wakeupslap.shortDesc: Power doubles if target is asleep, and wakes it.

watershuriken.name: Water Shuriken
watershuriken.desc: Hits two to five times. Has a 35% chance to hit two or three times and a 15% chance to hit four or five times. If one of the hits breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the remaining hits. If the user has the Skill Link Ability, this move will always hit five times. If the user is an Ash-Greninja with the Battle Bond Ability, this move has a power of 20 and always hits three times.
watershuriken.shortDesc: Usually goes first. Hits 2-5 times in one turn.

watersport.name: Water Sport
watersport.desc: For 5 turns, all Fire-type attacks used by any active Pokemon have their power multiplied by 0.33. Fails if this effect is already active.
watersport.shortDesc: For 5 turns, Fire-type attacks have 1/3 power.

wideguard.name: Wide Guard
wideguard.desc: The user and its party members are protected from moves made by other Pokemon, including allies, during this turn that target all adjacent foes or all adjacent Pokemon. This move modifies the same 1/X chance of being successful used by other protection moves, where X starts at 1 and triples each time this move is successfully used, but does not use the chance to check for failure. X resets to 1 if this move fails, if the user's last move used is not Baneful Bunker, Detect, Endure, King's Shield, Max Guard, Obstruct, Protect, Quick Guard, Silk Trap, Spiky Shield, or Wide Guard, or if it was one of those moves and the user's protection was broken. Fails if the user moves last this turn or if this move is already in effect for the user's side.
