wideguard.shortDesc: Protects allies from multi-target moves this turn.

acidspray.name: Acid Spray
acidspray.desc: Has a 100% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by 2 stages.
acidspray.shortDesc: 100% chance to lower the target's Sp. Def by 2.

acrobatics.name: Acrobatics
acrobatics.desc: Power doubles if the user has no held item.
acrobatics.shortDesc: Power doubles if the user has no held item.

acupressure.name: Acupressure
acupressure.desc: Raises a random stat by 2 stages as long as the stat is not already at stage 6. The user can choose to use this move on itself or an adjacent ally. Fails if no stat stage can be raised or if used on an ally with a substitute.
acupressure.shortDesc: Raises a random stat of the user or an ally by 2.

aerialace.name: Aerial Ace
aerialace.desc: This move does not check accuracy.
aerialace.shortDesc: This move does not check accuracy.

aeroblast.name: Aeroblast
aeroblast.desc: Has a higher chance for a critical hit.

afteryou.name: After You
afteryou.desc: The target makes its move immediately after the user this turn, no matter the priority of its selected move. Fails if the target would have moved next anyway, or if the target already moved this turn.
afteryou.shortDesc: The target makes its move right after the user.

agility.name: Agility
agility.desc: Raises the user's Speed by 2 stages.

amnesia.name: Amnesia
amnesia.desc: Raises the user's Special Defense by 2 stages.
amnesia.shortDesc: Raises the user's Sp. Def by 2.

ancientpower.name: Ancient Power
ancientpower.desc: Has a 10% chance to raise the user's Attack, Defense, Special Attack, Special Defense, and Speed by 1 stage.
ancientpower.shortDesc: 10% chance to raise all stats by 1 (not acc/eva).

aquacutter.name: Aqua Cutter
aquacutter.desc: Has a higher chance for a critical hit.

aquastep.name: Aqua Step
aquastep.desc: Has a 100% chance to raise the user's Speed by 1 stage.
aquastep.shortDesc: 100% chance to raise the user's Speed by 1.

armorcannon.name: Armor Cannon
armorcannon.desc: Lowers the user's Defense and Special Defense by 1 stage.
armorcannon.shortDesc: Lowers the user's Defense and Sp. Def by 1.

aromaticmist.name: Aromatic Mist
aromaticmist.desc: Raises the target's Special Defense by 1 stage. Fails if there is no ally adjacent to the user.
aromaticmist.shortDesc: Raises an ally's Sp. Def by 1.

astonish.name: Astonish
astonish.desc: Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.
astonish.shortDesc: 30% chance to make the target flinch.

astralbarrage.name: Astral Barrage
astralbarrage.shortDesc: No additional effect. Hits adjacent foes.

attackorder.name: Attack Order
attackorder.desc: Has a higher chance for a critical hit.

aurorabeam.name: Aurora Beam
aurorabeam.desc: Has a 10% chance to lower the target's Attack by 1 stage.
aurorabeam.shortDesc: 10% chance to lower the target's Attack by 1.

avalanche.name: Avalanche
avalanche.desc: Power doubles if the user was hit by the target this turn.
avalanche.shortDesc: Power doubles if user is damaged by the target.

axekick.name: Axe Kick
axekick.desc: Has a 30% chance to confuse the target. If this attack is not successful, the user loses half of its maximum HP, rounded down, as crash damage. Pokemon with the Magic Guard Ability are unaffected by crash damage.
axekick.shortDesc: 30% confusion. User loses 50% max HP if miss.

baddybad.name: Baddy Bad
baddybad.desc: This move summons Reflect for 5 turns upon use.

banefulbunker.name: Baneful Bunker
banefulbunker.desc: The user is protected from most attacks made by other Pokemon during this turn, and Pokemon making contact with the user become poisoned. This move has a 1/X chance of being successful, where X starts at 1 and triples each time this move is successfully used. X resets to 1 if this move fails, if the user's last move used is not Baneful Bunker, Detect, Endure, King's Shield, Max Guard, Obstruct, Protect, Quick Guard, Silk Trap, Spiky Shield, or Wide Guard, or if it was one of those moves and the user's protection was broken. Fails if the user moves last this turn.

barbbarrage.name: Barb Barrage
barbbarrage.desc: Has a 50% chance to poison the target. Power doubles if the target is already poisoned.
barbbarrage.shortDesc: 50% psn. 2x power if target already poisoned.

batonpass.name: Baton Pass
batonpass.desc: The user is replaced with another Pokemon in its party. The selected Pokemon has the user's stat stage changes, confusion, and certain move effects transferred to it.
batonpass.shortDesc: User switches, passing stat changes and more.

beatup.name: Beat Up
beatup.desc: Hits one time for the user and one time for each unfainted Pokemon without a non-volatile status condition in the user's party. The power of each hit is equal to 5+(X/10), where X is each participating Pokemon's base Attack; each hit is considered to come from the user.
beatup.shortDesc: All healthy allies aid in damaging the target.

belch.name: Belch
belch.desc: This move cannot be selected until the user eats a Berry, either by eating one that was held, stealing and eating one off another Pokemon with Bug Bite or Pluck, or eating one that was thrown at it with Fling. Once the condition is met, this move can be selected and used for the rest of the battle even if the user gains or uses another item or switches out. Consuming a Berry with Natural Gift does not count for the purposes of eating one.
belch.shortDesc: Cannot be selected until the user eats a Berry.

bellydrum.name: Belly Drum
bellydrum.desc: Raises the user's Attack by 12 stages in exchange for the user losing 1/2 of its maximum HP, rounded down. Fails if the user would faint or if its Attack stat stage is 6.
bellydrum.shortDesc: User loses 50% max HP. Maximizes Attack.

bide.name: Bide
bide.desc: The user spends two turns locked into this move and then, on the second turn after using this move, the user attacks the last Pokemon that hit it, inflicting double the damage in HP it lost to attacks during the two turns. If the last Pokemon that hit it is no longer active, the user attacks a random opposing Pokemon instead. If the user is prevented from moving during this move's use, the effect ends. This move does not check accuracy and does not ignore type immunity.
bide.shortDesc: Waits 2 turns; deals double the damage taken.

bite.name: Bite
bite.desc: Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.
bite.shortDesc: 30% chance to make the target flinch.

bitterblade.name: Bitter Blade
bitterblade.desc: The user recovers 1/2 the HP lost by the target, rounded half up. If Big Root is held by the user, the HP recovered is 1.3x normal, rounded half down.
bitterblade.shortDesc: User recovers 50% of the damage dealt.

bittermalice.name: Bitter Malice
bittermalice.desc: Has a 100% chance to lower the target's Attack by 1 stage.
bittermalice.shortDesc: 100% chance to lower the target's Attack by 1.

blastburn.name: Blast Burn
blastburn.desc: If this move is successful, the user must recharge on the following turn and cannot select a move.

blazingtorque.name: Blazing Torque
blazingtorque.desc: Has a 30% chance to burn the target.

bleakwindstorm.name: Bleakwind Storm
bleakwindstorm.desc: Has a 30% chance to lower the target's Speed by 1 stage. If the weather is Primordial Sea or Rain Dance, this move does not check accuracy. If this move is used against a Pokemon holding Utility Umbrella, this move's accuracy remains at 80%.
bleakwindstorm.shortDesc: 30% to lower foe(s) Speed by 1. Rain: can't miss.

blueflare.name: Blue Flare
blueflare.desc: Has a 20% chance to burn the target.

bodypress.name: Body Press
bodypress.desc: Damage is calculated using the user's Defense stat as its Attack, including stat stage changes. Other effects that modify the Attack stat are used as normal.
bodypress.shortDesc: Uses user's Def stat as Atk in damage calculation.

bodyslam.name: Body Slam
bodyslam.desc: Has a 30% chance to paralyze the target. Damage doubles and no accuracy check is done if the target has used Minimize while active.

boltstrike.name: Bolt Strike
boltstrike.desc: Has a 20% chance to paralyze the target.

boomburst.name: Boomburst
boomburst.shortDesc: No additional effect. Hits adjacent Pokemon.

bouncybubble.name: Bouncy Bubble
bouncybubble.desc: The user recovers 1/2 the HP lost by the target, rounded half up. If Big Root is held by the user, the HP recovered is 1.3x normal, rounded half down.
bouncybubble.shortDesc: User recovers 50% of the damage dealt.

bravebird.name: Brave Bird
bravebird.desc: If the target lost HP, the user takes recoil damage equal to 33% the HP lost by the target, rounded half up, but not less than 1 HP.

brickbreak.name: Brick Break
brickbreak.desc: If this attack does not miss, the effects of Reflect, Light Screen, and Aurora Veil end for the target's side of the field before damage is calculated.
brickbreak.shortDesc: Destroys screens, unless the target is immune.

brine.name: Brine
brine.desc: Power doubles if the target has less than or equal to half of its maximum HP remaining.
brine.shortDesc: Power doubles if the target's HP is 50% or less.

bulkup.name: Bulk Up
bulkup.desc: Raises the user's Attack and Defense by 1 stage.
bulkup.shortDesc: Raises the user's Attack and Defense by 1.

bulldoze.name: Bulldoze
bulldoze.desc: Has a 100% chance to lower the target's Speed by 1 stage.
bulldoze.shortDesc: 100% chance lower adjacent Pkmn Speed by 1.

buzzybuzz.name: Buzzy Buzz
buzzybuzz.desc: Has a 100% chance to paralyze the foe.

calmmind.name: Calm Mind
calmmind.desc: Raises the user's Special Attack and Special Defense by 1 stage.
calmmind.shortDesc: Raises the user's Sp. Atk and Sp. Def by 1.

ceaselessedge.name: Ceaseless Edge
ceaselessedge.desc: If this move is successful, it sets up a hazard on the opposing side of the field, damaging each opposing Pokemon that switches in, unless it is a Flying-type Pokemon or has the Levitate Ability. A maximum of three layers may be set, and opponents lose 1/8 of their maximum HP with one layer, 1/6 of their maximum HP with two layers, and 1/4 of their maximum HP with three layers, all rounded down. Can be removed from the opposing side if any opposing Pokemon uses Mortal Spin, Rapid Spin, or Defog successfully, or is hit by Defog.
ceaselessedge.shortDesc: Sets a layer of Spikes on the opposing side.

charge.name: Charge
charge.desc: Raises the user's Special Defense by 1 stage. The user's next Electric-type attack will have its power doubled; the effect ends when the user is no longer active, or after the user attempts to use any Electric-type move besides Charge, even if it is not successful.
charge.shortDesc: +1 SpD, user's next Electric move 2x power.

chillingwater.name: Chilling Water
chillingwater.desc: Has a 100% chance to lower the target's Attack by 1 stage.
chillingwater.shortDesc: 100% chance to lower the target's Attack by 1.

chillyreception.name: Chilly Reception
chillyreception.desc: For 5 turns, the weather becomes Snow. The user switches out even if it is trapped and is replaced immediately by a selected party member. The user does not switch out if there are no unfainted party members.

chipaway.name: Chip Away
chipaway.desc: Ignores the target's stat stage changes, including evasiveness.
chipaway.shortDesc: Ignores the target's stat stage changes.

chloroblast.name: Chloroblast
chloroblast.desc: Whether or not this move is successful and even if it would cause fainting, the user loses 1/2 of its maximum HP, rounded up, unless the user has the Magic Guard Ability.

circlethrow.name: Circle Throw
circlethrow.desc: If both the user and the target have not fainted, the target is forced to switch out and be replaced with a random unfainted ally. This effect fails if the target is under the effect of Ingrain, has the Suction Cups Ability, or this move hit a substitute.
circlethrow.shortDesc: Forces the target to switch to a random ally.

clearsmog.name: Clear Smog
clearsmog.desc: Resets all of the target's stat stages to 0.
clearsmog.shortDesc: Resets all of the target's stat stages to 0.

closecombat.name: Close Combat
closecombat.desc: Lowers the user's Defense and Special Defense by 1 stage.
closecombat.shortDesc: Lowers the user's Defense and Sp. Def by 1.

coaching.name: Coaching
coaching.desc: Raises the target's Attack and Defense by 1 stage. Fails if there is no ally adjacent to the user.
coaching.shortDesc: Raises an ally's Attack and Defense by 1.

coil.name: Coil
coil.desc: Raises the user's Attack, Defense, and accuracy by 1 stage.
coil.shortDesc: Raises user's Attack, Defense, accuracy by 1.

collisioncourse.name: Collision Course
collisioncourse.desc: Damage is multiplied by 1.3333 if this move is super effective against the target.

combattorque.name: Combat Torque
combattorque.desc: Has a 30% chance to paralyze the target.

comeuppance.name: Comeuppance
comeuppance.desc: Deals damage to the last opposing Pokemon to hit the user with a physical or special attack this turn equal to 1.5 times the HP lost by the user from that attack, rounded down. If the user did not lose HP from that attack, this move deals 1 HP of damage instead. If that opposing Pokemon's position is no longer in use and there is another opposing Pokemon on the field, the damage is done to it instead. Only the last hit of a multi-hit attack is counted. Fails if the user was not hit by an opposing Pokemon's physical or special attack this turn.
comeuppance.shortDesc: If hit by an attack, returns 1.5x damage.

confuseray.name: Confuse Ray
confuseray.desc: Causes the target to become confused.

confusion.name: Confusion
confusion.desc: Has a 10% chance to confuse the target.

coreenforcer.name: Core Enforcer
coreenforcer.desc: If the user moves after the target, the target's Ability is rendered ineffective as long as it remains active. If the target uses Baton Pass, the replacement will remain under this effect. If the target's Ability is As One, Battle Bond, Comatose, Commander, Disguise, Gulp Missile, Hadron Engine, Ice Face, Multitype, Orichalcum Pulse, Power Construct, Protosynthesis, Quark Drive, RKS System, Schooling, Shields Down, Stance Change, Zen Mode, or Zero to Hero, this effect does not happen, and receiving the effect through Baton Pass ends the effect immediately.
coreenforcer.shortDesc: Nullifies the foe(s) Ability if the foe(s) move first.

corrosivegas.name: Corrosive Gas
corrosivegas.desc: The target loses its held item. This move cannot cause Pokemon with the Sticky Hold Ability to lose their held item or cause a Kyogre, a Groudon, a Giratina, an Arceus, a Genesect, a Silvally, a Zacian, or a Zamazenta to lose their Blue Orb, Red Orb, Griseous Orb, Plate, Drive, Memory, Rusted Sword, or Rusted Shield respectively. Items lost to this move cannot be regained with Recycle or the Harvest Ability.

cottonguard.name: Cotton Guard
cottonguard.desc: Raises the user's Defense by 3 stages.

counter.name: Counter
counter.desc: Deals damage to the last opposing Pokemon to hit the user with a physical attack this turn equal to twice the HP lost by the user from that attack. If the user did not lose HP from the attack, this move deals 1 HP of damage instead. If that opposing Pokemon's position is no longer in use and there is another opposing Pokemon on the field, the damage is done to it instead. Only the last hit of a multi-hit attack is counted. Fails if the user was not hit by an opposing Pokemon's physical attack this turn.
counter.shortDesc: If hit by physical attack, returns double damage.

courtchange.name: Court Change
courtchange.desc: Switches the Mist, Light Screen, Reflect, Spikes, Safeguard, Tailwind, Toxic Spikes, Stealth Rock, Water Pledge, Fire Pledge, Grass Pledge, Sticky Web, Aurora Veil, G-Max Steelsurge, G-Max Cannonade, G-Max Vine Lash, and G-Max Wildfire effects from the user's side to the opposing side and vice versa.
courtchange.shortDesc: Swaps user's field effects with the opposing side.

crosschop.name: Cross Chop
crosschop.desc: Has a higher chance for a critical hit.

crunch.name: Crunch
crunch.desc: Has a 20% chance to lower the target's Defense by 1 stage.
crunch.shortDesc: 20% chance to lower the target's Defense by 1.

crushclaw.name: Crush Claw
crushclaw.desc: Has a 50% chance to lower the target's Defense by 1 stage.
crushclaw.shortDesc: 50% chance to lower the target's Defense by 1.

crushgrip.name: Crush Grip
crushgrip.desc: Power is equal to 120 * (target's current HP / target's maximum HP), rounded half down, but not less than 1.
crushgrip.shortDesc: More power the more HP the target has left.

curse.name: Curse
curse.desc: If the user is not a Ghost type, lowers the user's Speed by 1 stage and raises the user's Attack and Defense by 1 stage. If the user is a Ghost type, the user loses 1/2 of its maximum HP, rounded down and even if it would cause fainting, in exchange for the target losing 1/4 of its maximum HP, rounded down, at the end of each turn while it is active. If the target uses Baton Pass, the replacement will continue to be affected. Fails if there is no target or if the target is already affected.
curse.shortDesc: Curses if Ghost, else -1 Spe, +1 Atk, +1 Def.

darkpulse.name: Dark Pulse
darkpulse.desc: Has a 20% chance to make the target flinch.
darkpulse.shortDesc: 20% chance to make the target flinch.

dazzlinggleam.name: Dazzling Gleam
dazzlinggleam.shortDesc: No additional effect. Hits adjacent foes.

defensecurl.name: Defense Curl
defensecurl.desc: Raises the user's Defense by 1 stage. As long as the user remains active, the power of the user's Ice Ball and Rollout will be doubled (this effect is not stackable).

disable.name: Disable
disable.desc: For 4 turns, the target's last move used becomes disabled. Fails if one of the target's moves is already disabled, if the target has not made a move, if the target no longer knows the move, or if the move was a Max or G-Max Move.
disable.shortDesc: For 4 turns, disables the target's last move used.

discharge.name: Discharge
discharge.desc: Has a 30% chance to paralyze the target.

direclaw.name: Dire Claw
direclaw.desc: Has a 50% chance to cause the target to either fall asleep, become poisoned, or become paralyzed.
direclaw.shortDesc: 50% chance to sleep, poison, or paralyze target.

doodle.name: Doodle
doodle.desc: The user and its ally's Abilities change to match the target's Ability. Does not change Ability if the user's or its ally's is As One, Battle Bond, Comatose, Commander, Disguise, Gulp Missile, Hadron Engine, Ice Face, Multitype, Orichalcum Pulse, Power Construct, Protosynthesis, Quark Drive, RKS System, Schooling, Shields Down, Stance Change, Zen Mode, Zero to Hero, or already matches the target. Fails if both the user and its ally's Ability already matches the target, or if the target's Ability is As One, Battle Bond, Comatose, Commander, Disguise, Flower Gift, Forecast, Gulp Missile, Hadron Engine, Hunger Switch, Ice Face, Illusion, Imposter, Multitype, Neutralizing Gas, Orichalcum Pulse, Power Construct, Power of Alchemy, Protosynthesis, Quark Drive, Receiver, RKS System, Schooling, Shields Down, Stance Change, Trace, Wonder Guard, Zen Mode, or Zero to Hero.
doodle.shortDesc: User and ally's Abilities become target's Ability.

doomdesire.name: Doom Desire
doomdesire.desc: Deals damage two turns after this move is used. At the end of that turn, the damage is calculated at that time and dealt to the Pokemon at the position the target had when the move was used. If the user is no longer active at the time, damage is calculated based on the user's natural Special Attack stat, types, and level, with no boosts from its held item or Ability. Fails if this move or Future Sight is already in effect for the target's position.
doomdesire.shortDesc: Hits two turns after being used.

doubleedge.name: Double-Edge
doubleedge.desc: If the target lost HP, the user takes recoil damage equal to 33% the HP lost by the target, rounded half up, but not less than 1 HP.

doubleshock.name: Double Shock
doubleshock.desc: Fails unless the user is an Electric type. If this move is successful and the user is not Terastallized, the user's Electric type becomes typeless as long as it remains active.
doubleshock.shortDesc: User's Electric type: typeless; must be Electric.

doubleteam.name: Double Team
doubleteam.desc: Raises the user's evasiveness by 1 stage.

dragonascent.name: Dragon Ascent
dragonascent.desc: Lowers the user's Defense and Special Defense by 1 stage.
dragonascent.shortDesc: Lowers the user's Defense and Sp. Def by 1.

dragonbreath.name: Dragon Breath
dragonbreath.desc: Has a 30% chance to paralyze the target.

dragondance.name: Dragon Dance
dragondance.desc: Raises the user's Attack and Speed by 1 stage.
dragondance.shortDesc: Raises the user's Attack and Speed by 1.

dragonenergy.name: Dragon Energy
dragonenergy.desc: Power is equal to (user's current HP * 150 / user's maximum HP), rounded down, but not less than 1.
dragonenergy.shortDesc: Less power as user's HP decreases. Hits foe(s).

dragonrage.name: Dragon Rage
dragonrage.desc: Deals 40 HP of damage to the target.
dragonrage.shortDesc: Deals 40 HP of damage to the target.

dragonrush.name: Dragon Rush
dragonrush.desc: Has a 20% chance to make the target flinch. Damage doubles and no accuracy check is done if the target has used Minimize while active.
dragonrush.shortDesc: 20% chance to make the target flinch.

drillrun.name: Drill Run
drillrun.desc: Has a higher chance for a critical hit.

dualchop.name: Dual Chop
dualchop.desc: Hits twice. If the first hit breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the second hit.

dualwingbeat.name: Dual Wingbeat
dualwingbeat.desc: Hits twice. If the first hit breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the second hit.

dynamicpunch.name: Dynamic Punch
dynamicpunch.desc: Has a 100% chance to confuse the target.

earthpower.name: Earth Power
earthpower.desc: Has a 10% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by 1 stage.
earthpower.shortDesc: 10% chance to lower the target's Sp. Def by 1.

earthquake.name: Earthquake
earthquake.desc: Damage doubles if the target is using Dig.
earthquake.shortDesc: Hits adjacent Pokemon. Double damage on Dig.

eeriespell.name: Eerie Spell
eeriespell.desc: If this move is successful and the user has not fainted, the target loses 3 PP from its last move.
eeriespell.shortDesc: Removes 3 PP from the target's last move.

electrodrift.name: Electro Drift
electrodrift.desc: Damage is multiplied by 1.3333 if this move is super effective against the target.

embargo.name: Embargo
embargo.desc: For 5 turns, the target's held item has no effect. An item's effect of causing forme changes is unaffected, but any other effects from such items are negated. During the effect, Fling and Natural Gift are prevented from being used by the target. Items thrown at the target with Fling will still activate for it. If the target uses Baton Pass, the replacement will remain unable to use items.
embargo.shortDesc: For 5 turns, the target's item has no effect.

ember.name: Ember
ember.desc: Has a 10% chance to burn the target.

encore.name: Encore
encore.desc: For its next 3 turns, the target is forced to repeat its last move used. If the affected move runs out of PP, the effect ends. Fails if the target is already under this effect, if it has not made a move, if the move has 0 PP, or if the move is Assist, Blazing Torque, Combat Torque, Copycat, Dynamax Cannon, Encore, Magical Torque, Me First, Metronome, Mimic, Mirror Move, Nature Power, Noxious Torque, Sketch, Sleep Talk, Struggle, Transform, or Wicked Torque.
encore.shortDesc: Target repeats its last move for its next 3 turns.

endeavor.name: Endeavor
endeavor.desc: Deals damage to the target equal to (target's current HP - user's current HP). The target is unaffected if its current HP is less than or equal to the user's current HP.
endeavor.shortDesc: Lowers the target's HP to the user's HP.

entrainment.name: Entrainment
entrainment.desc: Causes the target's Ability to become the same as the user's. Fails if the target's Ability is As One, Battle Bond, Comatose, Commander, Disguise, Gulp Missile, Hadron Engine, Ice Face, Multitype, Orichalcum Pulse, Power Construct, Protosynthesis, Quark Drive, RKS System, Schooling, Shields Down, Stance Change, Truant, Zen Mode, Zero to Hero, or the same Ability as the user, or if the user's Ability is As One, Battle Bond, Comatose, Commander, Disguise, Flower Gift, Forecast, Gulp Missile, Hadron Engine, Hunger Switch, Ice Face, Illusion, Imposter, Multitype, Neutralizing Gas, Orichalcum Pulse, Power Construct, Power of Alchemy, Protosynthesis, Quark Drive, Receiver, RKS System, Schooling, Shields Down, Stance Change, Trace, Zen Mode, or Zero to Hero.
entrainment.shortDesc: The target's Ability changes to match the user's.

eruption.name: Eruption
eruption.desc: Power is equal to (user's current HP * 150 / user's maximum HP), rounded down, but not less than 1.
eruption.shortDesc: Less power as user's HP decreases. Hits foe(s).

esperwing.name: Esper Wing
esperwing.desc: Has a 100% chance to raise the user's Speed by 1 stage and a higher chance for a critical hit.
esperwing.shortDesc: 100% chance to raise user Speed by 1. High crit.

expandingforce.name: Expanding Force
expandingforce.desc: If the current terrain is Psychic Terrain and the user is grounded, this move hits all opposing Pokemon and has its power multiplied by 1.5.
expandingforce.shortDesc: User on Psychic Terrain: 1.5x power, hits foes.

explosion.name: Explosion
explosion.desc: The user faints after using this move, even if this move fails for having no target. This move is prevented from executing if any active Pokemon has the Damp Ability.
explosion.shortDesc: Hits adjacent Pokemon. The user faints.

facade.name: Facade
facade.desc: Power doubles if the user is burned, paralyzed, or poisoned. The physical damage halving effect from the user's burn is ignored.
facade.shortDesc: Power doubles if user is burn/poison/paralyzed.

fakeout.name: Fake Out
fakeout.desc: Has a 100% chance to make the target flinch. Fails unless it is the user's first turn on the field.
fakeout.shortDesc: Hits first. First turn out only. 100% flinch chance.

faketears.name: Fake Tears
faketears.desc: Lowers the target's Special Defense by 2 stages.
faketears.shortDesc: Lowers the target's Sp. Def by 2.

fierydance.name: Fiery Dance
fierydance.desc: Has a 50% chance to raise the user's Special Attack by 1 stage.
fierydance.shortDesc: 50% chance to raise the user's Sp. Atk by 1.

fierywrath.name: Fiery Wrath
fierywrath.desc: Has a 20% chance to make the target flinch.
fierywrath.shortDesc: 20% chance to make the foe(s) flinch.

filletaway.name: Fillet Away
filletaway.desc: Raises the user's Attack, Special Attack, and Speed by 2 stages in exchange for the user losing 1/2 of its maximum HP, rounded down. Fails if the user would faint or if its Attack, Special Attack, and Speed stat stages would not change.
filletaway.shortDesc: +2 Attack, Sp. Atk, Speed for 1/2 user's max HP.

firefang.name: Fire Fang
firefang.desc: Has a 10% chance to burn the target and a 10% chance to make it flinch.
firefang.shortDesc: 10% chance to burn. 10% chance to flinch.

firepunch.name: Fire Punch
firepunch.desc: Has a 10% chance to burn the target.

fishiousrend.name: Fishious Rend
fishiousrend.desc: Power doubles if the user moves before the target.
fishiousrend.shortDesc: Power doubles if user moves before the target.

fissure.name: Fissure
fissure.desc: Deals damage to the target equal to the target's maximum HP. Ignores accuracy and evasiveness modifiers. This attack's accuracy is equal to (user's level - target's level + 30)%, and fails if the target is at a higher level. Pokemon with the Sturdy Ability are immune.
fissure.shortDesc: OHKOs the target. Fails if user is a lower level.

flail.name: Flail
flail.desc: The power of this move is 20 if X is 33 to 48, 40 if X is 17 to 32, 80 if X is 10 to 16, 100 if X is 5 to 9, 150 if X is 2 to 4, and 200 if X is 0 or 1, where X is equal to (user's current HP * 48 / user's maximum HP), rounded down.
flail.shortDesc: More power the less HP the user has left.

flameburst.name: Flame Burst
flameburst.desc: If this move is successful, the target's ally loses 1/16 of its maximum HP, rounded down, unless it has the Magic Guard Ability.
flameburst.shortDesc: Damages Pokemon next to the target as well.

flamecharge.name: Flame Charge
flamecharge.desc: Has a 100% chance to raise the user's Speed by 1 stage.
flamecharge.shortDesc: 100% chance to raise the user's Speed by 1.

flamewheel.name: Flame Wheel
flamewheel.desc: Has a 10% chance to burn the target.
flamewheel.shortDesc: 10% chance to burn the target. Thaws user.

flareblitz.name: Flare Blitz
flareblitz.desc: Has a 10% chance to burn the target. If the target lost HP, the user takes recoil damage equal to 33% the HP lost by the target, rounded half up, but not less than 1 HP.
flareblitz.shortDesc: Has 33% recoil. 10% chance to burn. Thaws user.

flatter.name: Flatter
flatter.desc: Raises the target's Special Attack by 1 stage and confuses it.
flatter.shortDesc: Raises the target's Sp. Atk by 1 and confuses it.

fling.name: Fling
fling.desc: The power of this move is based on the user's held item. The held item is lost and it activates for the target if applicable. If there is no target or the target avoids this move by protecting itself, the user's held item is still lost. The user can regain a thrown item with Recycle or the Harvest Ability. Fails if the user has no held item, if the held item cannot be thrown, if the user is under the effect of Embargo or Magic Room, or if the user has the Klutz Ability.
fling.shortDesc: Flings the user's item at the target. Power varies.

flipturn.name: Flip Turn
flipturn.desc: If this move is successful and the user has not fainted, the user switches out even if it is trapped and is replaced immediately by a selected party member. The user does not switch out if there are no unfainted party members, or if the target switched out using an Eject Button or through the effect of the Emergency Exit or Wimp Out Abilities.
flipturn.shortDesc: User switches out after damaging the target.

floatyfall.name: Floaty Fall
floatyfall.desc: Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.
floatyfall.shortDesc: 30% chance to make the target flinch.

flowershield.name: Flower Shield
flowershield.desc: Raises the Defense of all active Grass-type Pokemon by 1 stage. Fails if there are no active Grass-type Pokemon.
flowershield.shortDesc: Raises Defense by 1 of all active Grass types.

flowertrick.name: Flower Trick
flowertrick.desc: This move is always a critical hit unless the target is under the effect of Lucky Chant or has the Battle Armor or Shell Armor Abilities. This move does not check accuracy.
flowertrick.shortDesc: Always results in a critical hit; no accuracy check.

focusblast.name: Focus Blast
focusblast.desc: Has a 10% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by 1 stage.
focusblast.shortDesc: 10% chance to lower the target's Sp. Def by 1.

focusenergy.name: Focus Energy
focusenergy.desc: Raises the user's chance for a critical hit by 2 stages. Fails if the user already has the effect. Baton Pass can be used to transfer this effect to an ally.
focusenergy.shortDesc: Raises the user's critical hit ratio by 2.

focuspunch.name: Focus Punch
focuspunch.desc: The user loses its focus and does nothing if it is hit by a damaging attack this turn before it can execute the move.
focuspunch.shortDesc: Fails if the user takes damage before it hits.

forcepalm.name: Force Palm
forcepalm.desc: Has a 30% chance to paralyze the target.

foresight.name: Foresight
foresight.desc: As long as the target remains active, its evasiveness stat stage is ignored during accuracy checks against it if it is greater than 0, and Normal- and Fighting-type attacks can hit the target if it is a Ghost type. Fails if the target is already affected, or affected by Miracle Eye or Odor Sleuth.
foresight.shortDesc: Fighting, Normal hit Ghost. Evasiveness ignored.

foulplay.name: Foul Play
foulplay.desc: Damage is calculated using the target's Attack stat, including stat stage changes. The user's Ability, item, and burn are used as normal.
foulplay.shortDesc: Uses target's Attack stat in damage calculation.

freezingglare.name: Freezing Glare
freezingglare.desc: Has a 10% chance to freeze the target.

freezyfrost.name: Freezy Frost
freezyfrost.desc: Resets the stat stages of all active Pokemon to 0.

frenzyplant.name: Frenzy Plant
frenzyplant.desc: If this move is successful, the user must recharge on the following turn and cannot select a move.

frustration.name: Frustration
frustration.desc: Power is equal to the greater of ((255 - user's Happiness) * 2/5), rounded down, or 1.

fusionbolt.name: Fusion Bolt
fusionbolt.desc: Power doubles if the last move used by any Pokemon this turn was Fusion Flare.
fusionbolt.shortDesc: Power doubles if used after Fusion Flare this turn.

gastroacid.name: Gastro Acid
gastroacid.desc: Causes the target's Ability to be rendered ineffective as long as it remains active. If the target uses Baton Pass, the replacement will remain under this effect. If the target's Ability is As One, Battle Bond, Comatose, Commander, Disguise, Gulp Missile, Hadron Engine, Ice Face, Multitype, Orichalcum Pulse, Power Construct, Protosynthesis, Quark Drive, RKS System, Schooling, Shields Down, Stance Change, Zen Mode, or Zero to Hero, this move fails, and receiving the effect through Baton Pass ends the effect immediately.

geomancy.name: Geomancy
geomancy.desc: Raises the user's Special Attack, Special Defense, and Speed by 2 stages. This attack charges on the first turn and executes on the second. If the user is holding a Power Herb, the move completes in one turn.
geomancy.shortDesc: Charges, then raises SpA, SpD, Spe by 2 turn 2.

gigaimpact.name: Giga Impact
gigaimpact.desc: If this move is successful, the user must recharge on the following turn and cannot make a move. If the target is knocked out by this move, the user does not have to recharge.
gigaimpact.shortDesc: User cannot move next turn, if the target isn't KO'ed.

gigatonhammer.name: Gigaton Hammer
gigatonhammer.desc: Cannot be used twice in a row.
gigatonhammer.shortDesc: Cannot be used twice in a row.

glaciallance.name: Glacial Lance
glaciallance.shortDesc: No additional effect. Hits adjacent foes.

glaiverush.name: Glaive Rush
glaiverush.desc: If this move is successful, moves targeted at the user deal double damage and do not check accuracy until the user's next turn.
glaiverush.shortDesc: User takes sure-hit 2x damage until its next turn.

glitzyglow.name: Glitzy Glow
glitzyglow.desc: This move summons Light Screen for 5 turns upon use.

grassknot.name: Grass Knot
grassknot.desc: This move's power is 20 if the target weighs less than 10 kg, 40 if less than 25 kg, 60 if less than 50 kg, 80 if less than 100 kg, 100 if less than 200 kg, and 120 if greater than or equal to 200 kg.
grassknot.shortDesc: More power the heavier the target.

grassyglide.name: Grassy Glide
grassyglide.desc: If the current terrain is Grassy Terrain and the user is grounded, this move has its priority increased by 1.

grudge.name: Grudge
grudge.desc: Until the user's next turn, if an opposing Pokemon's attack knocks the user out, that move loses all its remaining PP.
grudge.shortDesc: If the user faints, the attack used loses all its PP.

guardsplit.name: Guard Split
guardsplit.desc: The user and the target have their Defense and Special Defense stats set to be equal to the average of the user and the target's Defense and Special Defense stats, respectively, rounded down. Stat stage changes are unaffected.
guardsplit.shortDesc: Averages Defense and Sp. Def stats with target.

guardswap.name: Guard Swap
guardswap.desc: The user swaps its Defense and Special Defense stat stage changes with the target.
guardswap.shortDesc: Swaps Defense and Sp. Def changes with target.

guillotine.name: Guillotine
guillotine.desc: Deals damage to the target equal to the target's maximum HP. Ignores accuracy and evasiveness modifiers. This attack's accuracy is equal to (user's level - target's level + 30)%, and fails if the target is at a higher level. Pokemon with the Sturdy Ability are immune.
guillotine.shortDesc: OHKOs the target. Fails if user is a lower level.

gust.name: Gust
gust.desc: Power doubles if the target is using Bounce, Fly, or Sky Drop, or is under the effect of Sky Drop.
gust.shortDesc: Power doubles during Bounce, Fly, and Sky Drop.

hail.name: Hail
hail.desc: For 5 turns, the weather becomes Hail. At the end of each turn except the last, all active Pokemon lose 1/16 of their maximum HP, rounded down, unless they are an Ice type or have the Ice Body, Magic Guard, Overcoat, or Snow Cloak Abilities. Lasts for 8 turns if the user is holding Icy Rock. Fails if the current weather is Hail.

hammerarm.name: Hammer Arm
hammerarm.desc: Lowers the user's Speed by 1 stage.

harden.name: Harden
harden.desc: Raises the user's Defense by 1 stage.

haze.name: Haze
haze.desc: Resets the stat stages of all active Pokemon to 0.

headbutt.name: Headbutt
headbutt.desc: Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.
headbutt.shortDesc: 30% chance to make the target flinch.

headcharge.name: Head Charge
headcharge.desc: If the target lost HP, the user takes recoil damage equal to 1/4 the HP lost by the target, rounded half up, but not less than 1 HP.

headlongrush.name: Headlong Rush
headlongrush.desc: Lowers the user's Defense and Special Defense by 1 stage.
headlongrush.shortDesc: Lowers the user's Defense and Sp. Def by 1.

headsmash.name: Head Smash
headsmash.desc: If the target lost HP, the user takes recoil damage equal to 1/2 the HP lost by the target, rounded half up, but not less than 1 HP.

healblock.name: Heal Block
healblock.desc: For 5 turns, the target is prevented from restoring any HP as long as it remains active. During the effect, healing and draining moves are unusable, and Abilities and items that grant healing will not heal the user. If an affected Pokemon uses Baton Pass, the replacement will remain unable to restore its HP. Pain Split and the Regenerator Ability are unaffected.
healblock.shortDesc: For 5 turns, the foe(s) is prevented from healing.

healingwish.name: Healing Wish
healingwish.desc: The user faints, and if the Pokemon brought out to replace it does not have full HP or has a non-volatile status condition, its HP is fully restored along with having any non-volatile status condition cured. The replacement is sent out at the end of the turn, and the healing happens before hazards take effect. This effect continues until a Pokemon that meets either of these conditions switches in at the user's position or gets swapped into the position with Ally Switch. Fails if the user is the last unfainted Pokemon in its party.
healingwish.shortDesc: User faints. Next hurt Pokemon is fully healed.

heatcrash.name: Heat Crash
heatcrash.desc: The power of this move depends on (user's weight / target's weight), rounded down. Power is equal to 120 if the result is 5 or more, 100 if 4, 80 if 3, 60 if 2, and 40 if 1 or less. Damage doubles and no accuracy check is done if the target has used Minimize while active.
heatcrash.shortDesc: More power the heavier the user than the target.

heavyslam.name: Heavy Slam
heavyslam.desc: The power of this move depends on (user's weight / target's weight), rounded down. Power is equal to 120 if the result is 5 or more, 100 if 4, 80 if 3, 60 if 2, and 40 if 1 or less. Damage doubles and no accuracy check is done if the target has used Minimize while active.
heavyslam.shortDesc: More power the heavier the user than the target.

helpinghand.name: Helping Hand
helpinghand.desc: The power of the target's attack this turn is multiplied by 1.5 (this effect is stackable). Fails if there is no ally adjacent to the user or if the ally already moved this turn, but does not fail if the ally is using a two-turn move.
helpinghand.shortDesc: One adjacent ally's move power is 1.5x this turn.

highjumpkick.name: High Jump Kick
highjumpkick.desc: If this attack is not successful, the user loses half of its maximum HP, rounded down, as crash damage. Pokemon with the Magic Guard Ability are unaffected by crash damage.
highjumpkick.shortDesc: User is hurt by 50% of its max HP if it misses.

holdhands.name: Hold Hands
holdhands.desc: No competitive use. Fails if there is no ally adjacent to the user.

honeclaws.name: Hone Claws
honeclaws.desc: Raises the user's Attack and accuracy by 1 stage.
honeclaws.shortDesc: Raises the user's Attack and accuracy by 1.

howl.name: Howl
howl.desc: Raises the Attack of the user and all allies 1 stage.
howl.shortDesc: Raises the user's and ally's Attack by 1.

hydrocannon.name: Hydro Cannon
hydrocannon.desc: If this move is successful, the user must recharge on the following turn and cannot select a move.

hyperbeam.name: Hyper Beam
hyperbeam.desc: If this move is successful, the user must recharge on the following turn and cannot make a move. If the target is knocked out by this move, the user does not have to recharge.
hyperbeam.shortDesc: User cannot move next turn, if the target isn't KO'ed.

hyperfang.name: Hyper Fang
hyperfang.desc: Has a 10% chance to make the target flinch.
hyperfang.shortDesc: 10% chance to make the target flinch.

hypnosis.name: Hypnosis
hypnosis.desc: Causes the target to fall asleep.
hypnosis.shortDesc: Causes the target to fall asleep.

iceball.name: Ice Ball
iceball.desc: If this move is successful, the user is locked into this move and cannot make another move until it misses, 5 turns have passed, or the attack cannot be used. Power doubles with each successful hit of this move and doubles again if Defense Curl was used previously by the user. If this move is called by Sleep Talk, the move is used for one turn.
iceball.shortDesc: Power doubles with each hit. Repeats for 5 turns.

icefang.name: Ice Fang
icefang.desc: Has a 10% chance to freeze the target and a 10% chance to make it flinch.
icefang.shortDesc: 10% chance to freeze. 10% chance to flinch.

icespinner.name: Ice Spinner
icespinner.desc: Ends the effects of Electric Terrain, Grassy Terrain, Misty Terrain, and Psychic Terrain.

iciclecrash.name: Icicle Crash
iciclecrash.desc: Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.
iciclecrash.shortDesc: 30% chance to make the target flinch.

iciclespear.name: Icicle Spear
iciclespear.desc: Hits two to five times. Has a 35% chance to hit two or three times and a 15% chance to hit four or five times. If one of the hits breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the remaining hits. If the user has the Skill Link Ability, this move will always hit five times.

icywind.name: Icy Wind
icywind.desc: Has a 100% chance to lower the target's Speed by 1 stage.
icywind.shortDesc: 100% chance to lower the foe(s) Speed by 1.

infernalparade.name: Infernal Parade
infernalparade.desc: Has a 30% chance to burn the target. Power doubles if the target has a non-volatile status condition.
infernalparade.shortDesc: 30% burn. 2x power if target is already statused.

inferno.name: Inferno
inferno.desc: Has a 100% chance to burn the target.

ingrain.name: Ingrain
ingrain.desc: The user has 1/16 of its maximum HP restored at the end of each turn, but it is prevented from switching out and other Pokemon cannot force the user to switch out. The user can still switch out if it uses Baton Pass, Flip Turn, Parting Shot, Teleport, U-turn, or Volt Switch. If the user leaves the field using Baton Pass, the replacement will remain trapped and still receive the healing effect. During the effect, the user can be hit normally by Ground-type attacks and be affected by Spikes, Toxic Spikes, and Sticky Web, even if the user is a Flying type or has the Levitate Ability.
ingrain.shortDesc: Traps/grounds user; heals 1/16 max HP per turn.

iondeluge.name: Ion Deluge
iondeluge.desc: Causes Normal-type moves to become Electric type this turn. The effect happens after other effects that change a move's type.
iondeluge.shortDesc: Normal moves become Electric type this turn.

irondefense.name: Iron Defense
irondefense.desc: Raises the user's Defense by 2 stages.

ironhead.name: Iron Head
ironhead.desc: Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.
ironhead.shortDesc: 30% chance to make the target flinch.

junglehealing.name: Jungle Healing
junglehealing.desc: Each Pokemon on the user's side restores 1/4 of its maximum HP, rounded half up, and has its status condition cured.
junglehealing.shortDesc: User and allies: healed 1/4 max HP, status cured.

karatechop.name: Karate Chop
karatechop.desc: Has a higher chance for a critical hit.

kingsshield.name: King's Shield
kingsshield.desc: The user is protected from most attacks made by other Pokemon during this turn, and Pokemon trying to make contact with the user have their Attack lowered by 1 stage. Non-damaging moves go through this protection. This move has a 1/X chance of being successful, where X starts at 1 and triples each time this move is successfully used. X resets to 1 if this move fails, if the user's last move used is not Baneful Bunker, Detect, Endure, King's Shield, Max Guard, Obstruct, Protect, Quick Guard, Silk Trap, Spiky Shield, or Wide Guard, or if it was one of those moves and the user's protection was broken. Fails if the user moves last this turn.
kingsshield.shortDesc: Protects from damaging attacks. Contact: -1 Atk.

kowtowcleave.name: Kowtow Cleave
kowtowcleave.desc: This move does not check accuracy.
kowtowcleave.shortDesc: This move does not check accuracy.

laserfocus.name: Laser Focus
laserfocus.desc: Until the end of the next turn, the user's attacks will be critical hits.
laserfocus.shortDesc: Until the end of the next turn, user's moves crit.

lashout.name: Lash Out
lashout.desc: Power doubles if the user had a stat stage lowered this turn.
lashout.shortDesc: 2x power if the user had a stat lowered this turn.

lastresort.name: Last Resort
lastresort.desc: This move fails unless the user knows this move and at least one other move, and has used all the other moves it knows at least once each since it became active or Transformed.
lastresort.shortDesc: Fails unless each known move has been used.

lastrespects.name: Last Respects
lastrespects.desc: Power is equal to 50+(X*50), where X is the total number of times any Pokemon has fainted on the user's side, and X cannot be greater than 100.
lastrespects.shortDesc: +50 power for each time a party member fainted.

leechseed.name: Leech Seed
leechseed.desc: The Pokemon at the user's position steals 1/8 of the target's maximum HP, rounded down, at the end of each turn. If Big Root is held by the recipient, the HP recovered is 1.3x normal, rounded half down. If the target uses Baton Pass, the replacement will continue being leeched. If the target switches out or uses Mortal Spin or Rapid Spin successfully, the effect ends. Grass-type Pokemon are immune to this move on use, but not its effect.
leechseed.shortDesc: 1/8 of target's HP is restored to user every turn.

leer.name: Leer
leer.desc: Lowers the target's Defense by 1 stage.

lockon.name: Lock-On
lockon.desc: Until the end of the next turn, the target cannot avoid the user's moves, even if the target is in the middle of a two-turn move. The effect ends if either the user or the target leaves the field. Fails if this effect is active for the user.
lockon.shortDesc: User's next move will not miss the target.

luckychant.name: Lucky Chant
luckychant.desc: For 5 turns, the user and its party members cannot be struck by a critical hit. Fails if the effect is already active on the user's side.
luckychant.shortDesc: For 5 turns, shields user's party from critical hits.

luminacrash.name: Lumina Crash
luminacrash.desc: Has a 100% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by 2 stages.
luminacrash.shortDesc: 100% chance to lower the target's Sp. Def by 2.

lunarblessing.name: Lunar Blessing
lunarblessing.desc: Each Pokemon on the user's side restores 1/4 of its maximum HP, rounded half up, and has its status condition cured.
lunarblessing.shortDesc: User and allies: healed 1/4 max HP, status cured.

magicalleaf.name: Magical Leaf
magicalleaf.desc: This move does not check accuracy.
magicalleaf.shortDesc: This move does not check accuracy.

magicaltorque.name: Magical Torque
magicaltorque.desc: Has a 30% chance to confuse the target.

magnetbomb.name: Magnet Bomb
magnetbomb.desc: This move does not check accuracy.
magnetbomb.shortDesc: This move does not check accuracy.

magneticflux.name: Magnetic Flux
magneticflux.desc: Raises the Defense and Special Defense of Pokemon on the user's side with the Plus or Minus Abilities by 1 stage.
magneticflux.shortDesc: Raises Def, Sp. Def of allies with Plus/Minus by 1.

magnetrise.name: Magnet Rise
magnetrise.desc: For 5 turns, the user is immune to Ground-type attacks and the effects of Spikes, Toxic Spikes, Sticky Web, and the Arena Trap Ability as long as it remains active. If the user uses Baton Pass, the replacement will gain the effect. Ingrain, Smack Down, Thousand Arrows, and Iron Ball override this move if the user is under any of their effects. Fails if the user is already under this effect or the effects of Ingrain, Smack Down, or Thousand Arrows.
magnetrise.shortDesc: For 5 turns, the user has immunity to Ground.

magnitude.name: Magnitude
magnitude.desc: The power of this move varies; 5% chances for 10 and 150 power, 10% chances for 30 and 110 power, 20% chances for 50 and 90 power, and 30% chance for 70 power. Damage doubles if the target is using Dig.
magnitude.shortDesc: Hits adjacent Pokemon. Power varies; 2x on Dig.

makeitrain.name: Make It Rain
makeitrain.desc: Lowers the user's Special Attack by 1 stage.
makeitrain.shortDesc: Lowers the user's Sp. Atk by 1. Hits foe(s).

mefirst.name: Me First
mefirst.desc: The user uses the move the target chose for use this turn against it, if possible, with its power multiplied by 1.5. The move must be a damaging move other than Beak Blast, Belch, Blazing Torque, Combat Torque, Comeuppance, Counter, Covet, Focus Punch, Magical Torque, Me First, Metal Burst, Mirror Coat, Noxious Torque, Shell Trap, Struggle, Thief, or Wicked Torque. Fails if the target moves before the user. Ignores the target's substitute for the purpose of copying the move.
mefirst.shortDesc: Copies a foe at 1.5x power. User must be faster.

metalburst.name: Metal Burst
metalburst.desc: Deals damage to the last opposing Pokemon to hit the user with a physical or special attack this turn equal to 1.5 times the HP lost by the user from that attack, rounded down. If the user did not lose HP from that attack, this move deals 1 HP of damage instead. If that opposing Pokemon's position is no longer in use and there is another opposing Pokemon on the field, the damage is done to it instead. Only the last hit of a multi-hit attack is counted. Fails if the user was not hit by an opposing Pokemon's physical or special attack this turn.
metalburst.shortDesc: If hit by an attack, returns 1.5x damage.

metalclaw.name: Metal Claw
metalclaw.desc: Has a 10% chance to raise the user's Attack by 1 stage.
metalclaw.shortDesc: 10% chance to raise the user's Attack by 1.

meteorbeam.name: Meteor Beam
meteorbeam.desc: This attack charges on the first turn and executes on the second. Raises the user's Special Attack by 1 stage on the first turn. If the user is holding a Power Herb, the move completes in one turn.
meteorbeam.shortDesc: Raises user's Sp. Atk by 1 on turn 1. Hits turn 2.

mimic.name: Mimic
mimic.desc: While the user remains active, this move is replaced by the last move used by the target. The copied move has the maximum PP for that move. Fails if the target has not made a move, if the user has Transformed, if the user already knows the move, or if the move is Assist, Behemoth Bash, Behemoth Blade, Belch, Blazing Torque, Celebrate, Chatter, Combat Torque, Copycat, Dynamax Cannon, Hold Hands, Magical Torque, Me First, Metronome, Mimic, Mirror Move, Nature Power, Noxious Torque, Sketch, Sleep Talk, Struggle, Transform, or Wicked Torque.
mimic.shortDesc: The last move the target used replaces this one.

mindreader.name: Mind Reader
mindreader.desc: Until the end of the next turn, the target cannot avoid the user's moves, even if the target is in the middle of a two-turn move. The effect ends if either the user or the target leaves the field. Fails if this effect is active for the user.
mindreader.shortDesc: User's next move will not miss the target.

miracleeye.name: Miracle Eye
miracleeye.desc: As long as the target remains active, its evasiveness stat stage is ignored during accuracy checks against it if it is greater than 0, and Psychic-type attacks can hit the target if it is a Dark type. Fails if the target is already affected, or affected by Foresight or Odor Sleuth.

mirrorcoat.name: Mirror Coat
mirrorcoat.desc: Deals damage to the last opposing Pokemon to hit the user with a special attack this turn equal to twice the HP lost by the user from that attack. If the user did not lose HP from the attack, this move deals 1 HP of damage instead. If that opposing Pokemon's position is no longer in use and there is another opposing Pokemon on the field, the damage is done to it instead. Only the last hit of a multi-hit attack is counted. Fails if the user was not hit by an opposing Pokemon's special attack this turn.
mirrorcoat.shortDesc: If hit by special attack, returns double damage.

mirrormove.name: Mirror Move
mirrormove.desc: The user uses the last move used by the target. The copied move is used against that target, if possible. Fails if the target has not made a move, or if the last move used cannot be copied by this move.
mirrormove.shortDesc: User uses the target's last used move against it.

mist.name: Mist
mist.desc: For 5 turns, the user and its party members are protected from having their stat stages lowered by other Pokemon. Fails if the effect is already active on the user's side.
mist.shortDesc: For 5 turns, protects user's party from stat drops.

mistyexplosion.name: Misty Explosion
mistyexplosion.desc: If the current terrain is Misty Terrain and the user is grounded, this move's power is multiplied by 1.5. The user faints after using this move, even if this move fails for having no target. This move is prevented from executing if any active Pokemon has the Damp Ability.
mistyexplosion.shortDesc: User faints. User on Misty Terrain: 1.5x power.

mortalspin.name: Mortal Spin
mortalspin.desc: If this move is successful and the user has not fainted, the effects of Leech Seed and binding moves end for the user, and all hazards are removed from the user's side of the field. Has a 100% chance to poison the target.
mortalspin.shortDesc: Poisons foes, frees user from hazards/bind/leech.

mudslap.name: Mud-Slap
mudslap.desc: Has a 100% chance to lower the target's accuracy by 1 stage.
mudslap.shortDesc: 100% chance to lower the target's accuracy by 1.

mysticalpower.name: Mystical Power
mysticalpower.desc: Has a 100% chance to raise the user's Special Attack by 1 stage.
mysticalpower.shortDesc: 100% chance to raise the user's Sp. Atk by 1.

nastyplot.name: Nasty Plot
nastyplot.desc: Raises the user's Special Attack by 2 stages.
nastyplot.shortDesc: Raises the user's Sp. Atk by 2.

naturalgift.name: Natural Gift
naturalgift.desc: The type and power of this move depend on the user's held Berry, and the Berry is lost. Fails if the user is not holding a Berry, if the user has the Klutz Ability, or if Embargo or Magic Room is in effect for the user.
naturalgift.shortDesc: Power and type depends on the user's Berry.

nightmare.name: Nightmare
nightmare.desc: Causes the target to lose 1/4 of its maximum HP, rounded down, at the end of each turn as long as it is asleep. This move does not affect the target unless it is asleep. The effect ends when the target wakes up, even if it falls asleep again in the same turn.
nightmare.shortDesc: A sleeping target is hurt by 1/4 max HP per turn.

nightshade.name: Night Shade
nightshade.desc: Deals damage to the target equal to the user's level.
nightshade.shortDesc: Does damage equal to the user's level.

noretreat.name: No Retreat
noretreat.desc: Raises the user's Attack, Defense, Special Attack, Special Defense, and Speed by 1 stage, but it becomes prevented from switching out. The user can still switch out if it uses Baton Pass, Flip Turn, Parting Shot, Teleport, U-turn, or Volt Switch. If the user leaves the field using Baton Pass, the replacement will remain trapped. Fails if the user has already been prevented from switching by this effect.
noretreat.shortDesc: Raises all stats by 1 (not acc/eva). Traps user.

noxioustorque.name: Noxious Torque
noxioustorque.desc: Has a 30% chance to poison the target.

nuzzle.name: Nuzzle
nuzzle.desc: Has a 100% chance to paralyze the target.

odorsleuth.name: Odor Sleuth
odorsleuth.desc: As long as the target remains active, its evasiveness stat stage is ignored during accuracy checks against it if it is greater than 0, and Normal- and Fighting-type attacks can hit the target if it is a Ghost type. Fails if the target is already affected, or affected by Foresight or Miracle Eye.
odorsleuth.shortDesc: Fighting, Normal hit Ghost. Evasiveness ignored.

ominouswind.name: Ominous Wind
ominouswind.desc: Has a 10% chance to raise the user's Attack, Defense, Special Attack, Special Defense, and Speed by 1 stage.
ominouswind.shortDesc: 10% chance to raise all stats by 1 (not acc/eva).

orderup.name: Order Up
orderup.desc: If an ally Tatsugiri has activated its Commander Ability, this move raises the user's Attack by 1 stage if the Tatsugiri is Curly Form, Defense by 1 stage if Droopy Form, or Speed by 1 stage if Stretchy Form. The effect happens whether or not this move is successful, and even if the Tatsugiri that activated the effect has since fainted.

painsplit.name: Pain Split
painsplit.desc: The user and the target's HP become the average of their current HP, rounded down, but not more than the maximum HP of either one.
painsplit.shortDesc: Shares HP of user and target equally.

paleowave.name: Paleo Wave
paleowave.desc: Has a 20% chance to lower the target's Attack by 1 stage.
paleowave.shortDesc: 20% chance to lower the target's Attack by 1.

partingshot.name: Parting Shot
partingshot.desc: Lowers the target's Attack and Special Attack by 1 stage. If this move is successful, the user switches out even if it is trapped and is replaced immediately by a selected party member. The user does not switch out if the target's Attack and Special Attack stat stages were both unchanged, or if there are no unfainted party members.
partingshot.shortDesc: Lowers target's Atk, Sp. Atk by 1. User switches.

payback.name: Payback
payback.desc: Power doubles if the user moves after the target this turn, including actions taken through Instruct or the Dancer Ability. Switching in does not count as an action.
payback.shortDesc: Power doubles if the user moves after the target.

petaldance.name: Petal Dance
petaldance.desc: The user spends two or three turns locked into this move and becomes confused immediately after its move on the last turn of the effect if it is not already. This move targets an opposing Pokemon at random on each turn. If the user is prevented from moving, is asleep at the beginning of a turn, or the attack is not successful against the target on the first turn of the effect or the second turn of a three-turn effect, the effect ends without causing confusion. If this move is called by Sleep Talk and the user is asleep, the move is used for one turn and does not confuse the user.
petaldance.shortDesc: Lasts 2-3 turns. Confuses the user afterwards.

phantomforce.name: Phantom Force
phantomforce.desc: If this move is successful, it breaks through the target's Baneful Bunker, Detect, King's Shield, Protect, or Spiky Shield for this turn, allowing other Pokemon to attack the target normally. If the target's side is protected by Crafty Shield, Mat Block, Quick Guard, or Wide Guard, that protection is also broken for this turn and other Pokemon may attack the target's side normally. This attack charges on the first turn and executes on the second. On the first turn, the user avoids all attacks. If the user is holding a Power Herb, the move completes in one turn.
phantomforce.shortDesc: Disappears turn 1. Hits turn 2. Breaks protection.

pikapapow.name: Pika Papow
pikapapow.desc: Power is equal to the greater of (user's Happiness * 2/5), rounded down, or 1.

playrough.name: Play Rough
playrough.desc: Has a 10% chance to lower the target's Attack by 1 stage.
playrough.shortDesc: 10% chance to lower the target's Attack by 1.

pluck.name: Pluck
pluck.desc: If this move is successful and the user has not fainted, it steals the target's held Berry if it is holding one and eats it immediately, gaining its effects even if the user's item is being ignored. Items lost to this move cannot be regained with Recycle or the Harvest Ability.
pluck.shortDesc: User steals and eats the target's Berry.

poisonjab.name: Poison Jab
poisonjab.desc: Has a 30% chance to poison the target.

poltergeist.name: Poltergeist
poltergeist.desc: Fails if the target has no held item.
poltergeist.shortDesc: Fails if the target has no held item.

populationbomb.name: Population Bomb
populationbomb.desc: Hits ten times. This move checks accuracy for each hit, and the attack ends if the target avoids a hit. If one of the hits breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the remaining hits. If the user has the Skill Link Ability, this move will always hit ten times. If the user is holding Loaded Dice, this move hits four to ten times at random without checking accuracy between hits.
populationbomb.shortDesc: Hits 10 times. Each hit can miss.

pounce.name: Pounce
pounce.desc: Has a 100% chance to lower the target's Speed by 1 stage.
pounce.shortDesc: 100% chance to lower the target's Speed by 1.

powdersnow.name: Powder Snow
powdersnow.desc: Has a 10% chance to freeze the target.

powershift.name: Power Shift
powershift.desc: The user swaps its Attack and Defense stats, and stat stage changes remain on their respective stats. This move can be used again to swap the stats back. If the user uses Baton Pass, the replacement will have its Attack and Defense stats swapped if the effect is active. If the user has its stats recalculated by changing forme while its stats are swapped, this effect is ignored but is still active for the purposes of Baton Pass.
powershift.shortDesc: Switches user's Attack and Defense stats.

powersplit.name: Power Split
powersplit.desc: The user and the target have their Attack and Special Attack stats set to be equal to the average of the user and the target's Attack and Special Attack stats, respectively, rounded down. Stat stage changes are unaffected.
powersplit.shortDesc: Averages Attack and Sp. Atk stats with target.

powerswap.name: Power Swap
powerswap.desc: The user swaps its Attack and Special Attack stat stage changes with the target.
powerswap.shortDesc: Swaps Attack and Sp. Atk stat stages with target.

powertrick.name: Power Trick
powertrick.desc: The user swaps its Attack and Defense stats, and stat stage changes remain on their respective stats. This move can be used again to swap the stats back. If the user uses Baton Pass, the replacement will have its Attack and Defense stats swapped if the effect is active. If the user has its stats recalculated by changing forme while its stats are swapped, this effect is ignored but is still active for the purposes of Baton Pass.
powertrick.shortDesc: Switches user's Attack and Defense stats.

powertrip.name: Power Trip
powertrip.desc: Power is equal to 20+(X*20), where X is the user's total stat stage changes that are greater than 0.
powertrip.shortDesc: + 20 power for each of the user's stat boosts.

present.name: Present
present.desc: If this move is successful, it deals damage or heals the target. 40% chance for 40 power, 30% chance for 80 power, 10% chance for 120 power, and 20% chance to heal the target by 1/4 of its maximum HP, rounded down.
present.shortDesc: 40, 80, 120 power, or heals target 1/4 max HP.

protect.name: Protect
protect.desc: The user is protected from most attacks made by other Pokemon during this turn. This move has a 1/X chance of being successful, where X starts at 1 and triples each time this move is successfully used. X resets to 1 if this move fails, if the user's last move used is not Baneful Bunker, Detect, Endure, King's Shield, Max Guard, Obstruct, Protect, Quick Guard, Silk Trap, Spiky Shield, or Wide Guard, or if it was one of those moves and the user's protection was broken. Fails if the user moves last this turn.
protect.shortDesc: Prevents moves from affecting the user this turn.

psybeam.name: Psybeam
psybeam.desc: Has a 10% chance to confuse the target.

psychoboost.name: Psycho Boost
psychoboost.desc: Lowers the user's Special Attack by 2 stages.
psychoboost.shortDesc: Lowers the user's Sp. Atk by 2.

psyshieldbash.name: Psyshield Bash
psyshieldbash.desc: Has a 100% chance to raise the user's Defense by 1 stage.
psyshieldbash.shortDesc: 100% chance to raise the user's Defense by 1.

psyshock.name: Psyshock
psyshock.desc: Deals damage to the target based on its Defense instead of Special Defense.
psyshock.shortDesc: Damages target based on Defense, not Sp. Def.

psystrike.name: Psystrike
psystrike.desc: Deals damage to the target based on its Defense instead of Special Defense.
psystrike.shortDesc: Damages target based on Defense, not Sp. Def.

punishment.name: Punishment
punishment.desc: Power is equal to 60+(X*20), where X is the target's total stat stage changes that are greater than 0, but not more than 200 power.
punishment.shortDesc: 60 power +20 for each of the target's stat boosts.

pursuit.name: Pursuit
pursuit.desc: If an opposing Pokemon switches out this turn, this move hits that Pokemon before it leaves the field, even if it was not the original target. If the user moves after an opponent using Flip Turn, Parting Shot, Teleport, U-turn, or Volt Switch, but not Baton Pass, it will hit that opponent before it leaves the field. Power doubles and no accuracy check is done if the user hits an opponent switching out, and the user's turn is over; if an opponent faints from this, the replacement Pokemon does not become active until the end of the turn.
pursuit.shortDesc: If a foe is switching out, hits it at 2x power.

quash.name: Quash
quash.desc: Causes the target to take its turn after all other Pokemon this turn, no matter the priority of its selected move. Fails if the target already moved this turn.
quash.shortDesc: Forces the target to move last this turn.

quiverdance.name: Quiver Dance
quiverdance.desc: Raises the user's Special Attack, Special Defense, and Speed by 1 stage.
quiverdance.shortDesc: Raises the user's Sp. Atk, Sp. Def, Speed by 1.

ragefist.name: Rage Fist
ragefist.desc: Power is equal to 50+(X*50), where X is the total number of times the user has been hit by a damaging attack during the battle, even if the user did not lose HP from the attack. X cannot be greater than 6 and does not reset upon switching out or fainting. Each hit of a multi-hit attack is counted, but confusion damage is not counted.
ragefist.shortDesc: +50 power for each time user was hit. Max 6 hits.

ragingbull.name: Raging Bull
ragingbull.desc: If this attack does not miss, the effects of Reflect, Light Screen, and Aurora Veil end for the target's side of the field before damage is calculated. If the user's current form is a Paldean Tauros, this move's type changes to match. Fighting type for Combat Breed, Fire type for Blaze Breed, and Water type for Aqua Breed.
ragingbull.shortDesc: Destroys screens. Type depends on user's form.

ragingfury.name: Raging Fury
ragingfury.desc: The user spends two or three turns locked into this move and becomes confused immediately after its move on the last turn of the effect if it is not already. This move targets an opposing Pokemon at random on each turn. If the user is prevented from moving, is asleep at the beginning of a turn, or the attack is not successful against the target on the first turn of the effect or the second turn of a three-turn effect, the effect ends without causing confusion. If this move is called by Sleep Talk and the user is asleep, the move is used for one turn and does not confuse the user.
ragingfury.shortDesc: Lasts 2-3 turns. Confuses the user afterwards.

raindance.name: Rain Dance
raindance.desc: For 5 turns, the weather becomes Rain Dance. The damage of Water-type attacks is multiplied by 1.5 and the damage of Fire-type attacks is multiplied by 0.5 during the effect. Lasts for 8 turns if the user is holding Damp Rock. Fails if the current weather is Rain Dance.
raindance.shortDesc: For 5 turns, heavy rain powers Water moves.

razorleaf.name: Razor Leaf
razorleaf.desc: Has a higher chance for a critical hit.
razorleaf.shortDesc: High critical hit ratio. Hits adjacent foes.

recover.name: Recover
recover.desc: The user restores 1/2 of its maximum HP, rounded half up.
recover.shortDesc: Heals the user by 50% of its max HP.

reflecttype.name: Reflect Type
reflecttype.desc: Causes the user's types to become the same as the current types of the target. If the target's current types include typeless and a non-added type, typeless is ignored. If the target's current types include typeless and an added type from Forest's Curse or Trick-or-Treat, typeless is copied as the Normal type instead. Fails if the user is an Arceus or a Silvally, if the user is Terastallized, or if the target's current type is typeless alone.
reflecttype.shortDesc: User becomes the same type as the target.

refresh.name: Refresh
refresh.desc: The user cures its burn, poison, or paralysis. Fails if the user is not burned, poisoned, or paralyzed.
refresh.shortDesc: User cures its burn, poison, or paralysis.

rest.name: Rest
rest.desc: The user falls asleep for the next two turns and restores all of its HP, curing itself of any non-volatile status condition in the process. Fails if the user has full HP, is already asleep, or if another effect is preventing sleep.
rest.shortDesc: User sleeps 2 turns and restores HP and status.

return.name: Return
return.desc: Power is equal to the greater of (user's Happiness * 2/5), rounded down, or 1.

revenge.name: Revenge
revenge.desc: Power doubles if the user was hit by the target this turn.
revenge.shortDesc: Power doubles if user is damaged by the target.

reversal.name: Reversal
reversal.desc: The power of this move is 20 if X is 33 to 48, 40 if X is 17 to 32, 80 if X is 10 to 16, 100 if X is 5 to 9, 150 if X is 2 to 4, and 200 if X is 0 or 1, where X is equal to (user's current HP * 48 / user's maximum HP), rounded down.
reversal.shortDesc: More power the less HP the user has left.

revivalblessing.name: Revival Blessing
revivalblessing.desc: A fainted party member is selected and revived with 1/2 its max HP, rounded down. Fails if there are no fainted party members.
revivalblessing.shortDesc: Revives a fainted Pokemon to 50% HP.

risingvoltage.name: Rising Voltage
risingvoltage.desc: If the current terrain is Electric Terrain and the target is grounded, this move's power is doubled.
risingvoltage.shortDesc: 2x power if target is grounded in Electric Terrain.

roaroftime.name: Roar of Time
roaroftime.desc: If this move is successful, the user must recharge on the following turn and cannot select a move.

rockblast.name: Rock Blast
rockblast.desc: Hits two to five times. Has a 35% chance to hit two or three times and a 15% chance to hit four or five times. If one of the hits breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the remaining hits. If the user has the Skill Link Ability, this move will always hit five times.

rockpolish.name: Rock Polish
rockpolish.desc: Raises the user's Speed by 2 stages.

rockwrecker.name: Rock Wrecker
rockwrecker.desc: If this move is successful, the user must recharge on the following turn and cannot select a move.

roleplay.name: Role Play
roleplay.desc: The user's Ability changes to match the target's Ability. Fails if the user's Ability is As One, Battle Bond, Comatose, Commander, Disguise, Gulp Missile, Hadron Engine, Ice Face, Multitype, Orichalcum Pulse, Power Construct, Protosynthesis, Quark Drive, RKS System, Schooling, Shields Down, Stance Change, Zen Mode, Zero to Hero, or already matches the target, or if the target's Ability is As One, Battle Bond, Comatose, Commander, Disguise, Flower Gift, Forecast, Gulp Missile, Hadron Engine, Hunger Switch, Ice Face, Illusion, Imposter, Multitype, Neutralizing Gas, Orichalcum Pulse, Power Construct, Power of Alchemy, Protosynthesis, Quark Drive, Receiver, RKS System, Schooling, Shields Down, Stance Change, Trace, Wonder Guard, Zen Mode, or Zero to Hero.
roleplay.shortDesc: User replaces its Ability with the target's.

rollout.name: Rollout
rollout.desc: If this move is successful, the user is locked into this move and cannot make another move until it misses, 5 turns have passed, or the attack cannot be used. Power doubles with each successful hit of this move and doubles again if Defense Curl was used previously by the user. If this move is called by Sleep Talk, the move is used for one turn.
rollout.shortDesc: Power doubles with each hit. Repeats for 5 turns.

roost.name: Roost
roost.desc: The user restores 1/2 of its maximum HP, rounded half up. If the user is not Terastallized, until the end of the turn Flying-type users lose their Flying type and pure Flying-type users become Normal type. Does nothing if the user's HP is full.
roost.shortDesc: Heals 50% HP. Flying-type removed 'til turn ends.

rototiller.name: Rototiller
rototiller.desc: Raises the Attack and Special Attack of all grounded Grass-type Pokemon on the field by 1 stage.
rototiller.shortDesc: Raises Atk/Sp. Atk of grounded Grass types by 1.

ruination.name: Ruination
ruination.desc: Deals damage to the target equal to half of its current HP, rounded down, but not less than 1 HP.
ruination.shortDesc: Does damage equal to 1/2 target's current HP.

sacredfire.name: Sacred Fire
sacredfire.desc: Has a 50% chance to burn the target.
sacredfire.shortDesc: 50% chance to burn the target. Thaws user.

safeguard.name: Safeguard
safeguard.desc: For 5 turns, the user and its party members cannot have non-volatile status conditions or confusion inflicted on them by other Pokemon. Pokemon on the user's side cannot become affected by Yawn but can fall asleep from its effect. It is removed from the user's side if the user or an ally is successfully hit by Defog. Fails if the effect is already active on the user's side.
safeguard.shortDesc: For 5 turns, protects user's party from status.

saltcure.name: Salt Cure
saltcure.desc: Causes damage to the target equal to 1/8 of its maximum HP (1/4 if the target is Steel or Water type), rounded down, at the end of each turn during effect. This effect ends when the target is no longer active.
saltcure.shortDesc: Deals 1/8 max HP each turn; 1/4 on Steel, Water.

sandattack.name: Sand Attack
sandattack.desc: Lowers the target's accuracy by 1 stage.

sandsearstorm.name: Sandsear Storm
sandsearstorm.desc: Has a 20% chance to burn the target. If the weather is Primordial Sea or Rain Dance, this move does not check accuracy. If this move is used against a Pokemon holding Utility Umbrella, this move's accuracy remains at 80%.
sandsearstorm.shortDesc: 20% chance to burn foe(s). Can't miss in rain.

sandstorm.name: Sandstorm
sandstorm.desc: For 5 turns, the weather becomes Sandstorm. At the end of each turn except the last, all active Pokemon lose 1/16 of their maximum HP, rounded down, unless they are a Ground, Rock, or Steel type, or have the Magic Guard, Overcoat, Sand Force, Sand Rush, or Sand Veil Abilities. During the effect, the Special Defense of Rock-type Pokemon is multiplied by 1.5 when taking damage from a special attack. Lasts for 8 turns if the user is holding Smooth Rock. Fails if the current weather is Sandstorm.
sandstorm.shortDesc: For 5 turns, a sandstorm rages. Rock: 1.5x SpD.

sappyseed.name: Sappy Seed
sappyseed.desc: This move summons Leech Seed on the foe.

scaleshot.name: Scale Shot
scaleshot.desc: Hits two to five times. Lowers the user's Defense by 1 stage and raises the user's Speed by 1 stage after the last hit. Has a 35% chance to hit two or three times and a 15% chance to hit four or five times. If one of the hits breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the remaining hits. If the user has the Skill Link Ability, this move will always hit five times.
scaleshot.shortDesc: Hits 2-5 times. User: -1 Def, +1 Spe after last hit.

scorchingsands.name: Scorching Sands
scorchingsands.desc: Has a 30% chance to burn the target. The target thaws out if it is frozen.
scorchingsands.shortDesc: 30% chance to burn the target. Thaws target.

searingshot.name: Searing Shot
searingshot.desc: Has a 30% chance to burn the target.

seedflare.name: Seed Flare
seedflare.desc: Has a 40% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by 2 stages.
seedflare.shortDesc: 40% chance to lower the target's Sp. Def by 2.

seismictoss.name: Seismic Toss
seismictoss.desc: Deals damage to the target equal to the user's level.
seismictoss.shortDesc: Does damage equal to the user's level.

shadowball.name: Shadow Ball
shadowball.desc: Has a 20% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by 1 stage.
shadowball.shortDesc: 20% chance to lower the target's Sp. Def by 1.

shadowclaw.name: Shadow Claw
shadowclaw.desc: Has a higher chance for a critical hit.

shadowforce.name: Shadow Force
shadowforce.desc: If this move is successful, it breaks through the target's Baneful Bunker, Detect, King's Shield, Protect, or Spiky Shield for this turn, allowing other Pokemon to attack the target normally. If the target's side is protected by Crafty Shield, Mat Block, Quick Guard, or Wide Guard, that protection is also broken for this turn and other Pokemon may attack the target's side normally. This attack charges on the first turn and executes on the second. On the first turn, the user avoids all attacks. If the user is holding a Power Herb, the move completes in one turn.
shadowforce.shortDesc: Disappears turn 1. Hits turn 2. Breaks protection.

shadowstrike.name: Shadow Strike
shadowstrike.desc: Has a 50% chance to lower the target's Defense by 1 stage.
shadowstrike.shortDesc: 50% chance to lower the target's Defense by 1.

sharpen.name: Sharpen
sharpen.desc: Raises the user's Attack by 1 stage.

shedtail.name: Shed Tail
shedtail.desc: The user takes 1/2 of its maximum HP, rounded up, and creates a substitute that has 1/4 of the user's maximum HP, rounded down. The user is replaced with another Pokemon in its party and the selected Pokemon has the substitute transferred to it. Fails if the user would faint, or if there are no unfainted party members.
shedtail.shortDesc: User takes 1/2 its max HP to pass a substitute.

sheercold.name: Sheer Cold
sheercold.desc: Deals damage to the target equal to the target's maximum HP. Ignores accuracy and evasiveness modifiers. This attack's accuracy is equal to (user's level - target's level + X)%, where X is 30 if the user is an Ice type and 20 otherwise, and fails if the target is at a higher level. Ice-type Pokemon and Pokemon with the Sturdy Ability are immune.
sheercold.shortDesc: OHKOs non-Ice targets. Fails if user's lower level.

shellsidearm.name: Shell Side Arm
shellsidearm.desc: Has a 20% chance to poison the target.
