This move becomes a physical attack that makes contact if the value of ((((2 * the user's level / 5 + 2) * 90 * X) / Y) / 50), where X is the user's Attack stat and Y is the target's Defense stat, is greater than the same value where X is the user's Special Attack stat and Y is the target's Special Defense stat. No stat modifiers other than stat stage changes are considered for this purpose. If the two values are equal, this move chooses a damage category at random.
shellsidearm.shortDesc: 20% psn. Physical+contact if it would be stronger.

shellsmash.name: Shell Smash
shellsmash.desc: Lowers the user's Defense and Special Defense by 1 stage. Raises the user's Attack, Special Attack, and Speed by 2 stages.
shellsmash.shortDesc: Lowers Def, SpD by 1; raises Atk, SpA, Spe by 2.

shelltrap.name: Shell Trap
shelltrap.desc: Fails unless the user is hit by a physical attack from an opponent this turn before it can execute the move. If the user was hit and has not fainted, it attacks immediately after being hit, and the effect ends. If the opponent's physical attack had a secondary effect removed by the Sheer Force Ability, it does not count for the purposes of this effect.
shelltrap.shortDesc: User must take physical damage before moving.

shelter.name: Shelter
shelter.desc: Raises the user's Defense by 2 stages.

shiftgear.name: Shift Gear
shiftgear.desc: Raises the user's Speed by 2 stages and its Attack by 1 stage.
shiftgear.shortDesc: Raises the user's Speed by 2 and Attack by 1.

shockwave.name: Shock Wave
shockwave.desc: This move does not check accuracy.
shockwave.shortDesc: This move does not check accuracy.

signalbeam.name: Signal Beam
signalbeam.desc: Has a 10% chance to confuse the target.

silktrap.name: Silk Trap
silktrap.desc: The user is protected from most attacks made by other Pokemon during this turn, and Pokemon trying to make contact with the user have their Speed lowered by 1 stage. Non-damaging moves go through this protection. This move has a 1/X chance of being successful, where X starts at 1 and triples each time this move is successfully used. X resets to 1 if this move fails, if the user's last move used is not Baneful Bunker, Detect, Endure, King's Shield, Max Guard, Obstruct, Protect, Quick Guard, Silk Trap, Spiky Shield, or Wide Guard, or if it was one of those moves and the user's protection was broken. Fails if the user moves last this turn.
silktrap.shortDesc: Protects from damaging attacks. Contact: -1 Spe.

simplebeam.name: Simple Beam
simplebeam.desc: Causes the target's Ability to become Simple. Fails if the target's Ability is As One, Battle Bond, Comatose, Commander, Disguise, Gulp Missile, Hadron Engine, Ice Face, Multitype, Orichalcum Pulse, Power Construct, Protosynthesis, Quark Drive, RKS System, Schooling, Shields Down, Simple, Stance Change, Truant, Zen Mode, or Zero to Hero.

sizzlyslide.name: Sizzly Slide
sizzlyslide.desc: Has a 100% chance to burn the foe.

skittersmack.name: Skitter Smack
skittersmack.desc: Has a 100% chance to lower the target's Special Attack by 1 stage.
skittersmack.shortDesc: 100% chance to lower target's Sp. Atk by 1.

skyuppercut.name: Sky Uppercut
skyuppercut.desc: This move can hit a target using Bounce, Fly, or Sky Drop, or is under the effect of Sky Drop.
skyuppercut.shortDesc: Can hit Pokemon using Bounce, Fly, or Sky Drop.

slackoff.name: Slack Off
slackoff.desc: The user restores 1/2 of its maximum HP, rounded half up.
slackoff.shortDesc: Heals the user by 50% of its max HP.

sleeptalk.name: Sleep Talk
sleeptalk.desc: One of the user's known moves, besides this move, is selected for use at random. Fails if the user is not asleep. The selected move does not have PP deducted from it, and can currently have 0 PP. This move cannot select Assist, Beak Blast, Belch, Bide, Blazing Torque, Celebrate, Chatter, Combat Torque, Copycat, Dynamax Cannon, Focus Punch, Hold Hands, Magical Torque, Me First, Metronome, Mimic, Mirror Move, Nature Power, Noxious Torque, Shell Trap, Sketch, Sleep Talk, Struggle, Uproar, Wicked Torque, or any two-turn move.
sleeptalk.shortDesc: User must be asleep. Uses another known move.

sludge.name: Sludge
sludge.desc: Has a 30% chance to poison the target.

sludgebomb.name: Sludge Bomb
sludgebomb.desc: Has a 30% chance to poison the target.

sludgewave.name: Sludge Wave
sludgewave.desc: Has a 10% chance to poison the target.

smokescreen.name: Smokescreen
smokescreen.desc: Lowers the target's accuracy by 1 stage.

snatch.name: Snatch
snatch.desc: If another Pokemon uses certain non-damaging moves this turn, the user steals that move to use itself. If multiple Pokemon use one of those moves this turn, the applicable moves are all stolen by the first Pokemon in turn order that used this move this turn. This effect is ignored while the user is under the effect of Sky Drop.
snatch.shortDesc: User steals certain support moves to use itself.

snowscape.name: Snowscape
snowscape.desc: For 5 turns, the weather becomes Snow. During the effect, the Defense of Ice-type Pokemon is multiplied by 1.5 when taking damage from a physical attack. Lasts for 8 turns if the user is holding Icy Rock. Fails if the current weather is Snow.
snowscape.shortDesc: For 5 turns, snow falls. Ice: 1.5x Def.

softboiled.name: Soft-Boiled
softboiled.desc: The user restores 1/2 of its maximum HP, rounded half up.
softboiled.shortDesc: Heals the user by 50% of its max HP.

sonicboom.name: Sonic Boom
sonicboom.desc: Deals 20 HP of damage to the target.

spacialrend.name: Spacial Rend
spacialrend.desc: Has a higher chance for a critical hit.

spark.name: Spark
spark.desc: Has a 30% chance to paralyze the target.

sparklyswirl.name: Sparkly Swirl
sparklyswirl.desc: Every Pokemon in the user's party is cured of its non-volatile status condition.
sparklyswirl.shortDesc: Cures the user's party of all status conditions.

spicyextract.name: Spicy Extract
spicyextract.desc: Raises the target's Attack by 2 stages and lowers its Defense by 2 stages.
spicyextract.shortDesc: Raises target's Atk by 2 and lowers its Def by 2.

spikes.name: Spikes
spikes.desc: Sets up a hazard on the opposing side of the field, damaging each opposing Pokemon that switches in, unless it is a Flying-type Pokemon or has the Levitate Ability. Can be used up to three times before failing. Opponents lose 1/8 of their maximum HP with one layer, 1/6 of their maximum HP with two layers, and 1/4 of their maximum HP with three layers, all rounded down. Can be removed from the opposing side if any opposing Pokemon uses Mortal Spin, Rapid Spin, or Defog successfully, or is hit by Defog.
spikes.shortDesc: Hurts grounded foes on switch-in. Max 3 layers.

spinout.name: Spin Out
spinout.desc: Lowers the user's Speed by 2 stages.

spitup.name: Spit Up
spitup.desc: Power is equal to 100 times the user's Stockpile count. Fails if the user's Stockpile count is 0. Whether or not this move is successful, the user's Defense and Special Defense decrease by as many stages as Stockpile had increased them, and the user's Stockpile count resets to 0.
spitup.shortDesc: More power with more uses of Stockpile.

spite.name: Spite
spite.desc: Causes the target's last move used to lose 4 PP. Fails if the target has not made a move, if the move has 0 PP, or if it no longer knows the move.
spite.shortDesc: Lowers the PP of the target's last move by 4.

splishysplash.name: Splishy Splash
splishysplash.desc: Has a 30% chance to paralyze the target.

springtidestorm.name: Springtide Storm
springtidestorm.desc: Has a 30% chance to lower the target's Attack by 1 stage.
springtidestorm.shortDesc: 30% chance to lower the foe(s) Attack by 1.

stealthrock.name: Stealth Rock
stealthrock.desc: Sets up a hazard on the opposing side of the field, damaging each opposing Pokemon that switches in. Fails if the effect is already active on the opposing side. Foes lose 1/32, 1/16, 1/8, 1/4, or 1/2 of their maximum HP, rounded down, based on their weakness to the Rock type; 0.25x, 0.5x, neutral, 2x, or 4x, respectively. Can be removed from the opposing side if any opposing Pokemon uses Mortal Spin, Rapid Spin, or Defog successfully, or is hit by Defog.
stealthrock.shortDesc: Hurts foes on switch-in. Factors Rock weakness.

steamroller.name: Steamroller
steamroller.desc: Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch. Damage doubles and no accuracy check is done if the target has used Minimize while active.
steamroller.shortDesc: 30% chance to make the target flinch.

steelroller.name: Steel Roller
steelroller.desc: Fails if there is no terrain active. Ends the effects of Electric Terrain, Grassy Terrain, Misty Terrain, and Psychic Terrain.
steelroller.shortDesc: Fails if there is no terrain active. Ends the terrain.

stockpile.name: Stockpile
stockpile.desc: Raises the user's Defense and Special Defense by 1 stage. The user's Stockpile count increases by 1. Fails if the user's Stockpile count is 3. The user's Stockpile count is reset to 0 when it is no longer active.
stockpile.shortDesc: Raises user's Defense, Sp. Def by 1. Max 3 uses.

stoneaxe.name: Stone Axe
stoneaxe.desc: If this move is successful, it sets up a hazard on the opposing side of the field, damaging each opposing Pokemon that switches in. Foes lose 1/32, 1/16, 1/8, 1/4, or 1/2 of their maximum HP, rounded down, based on their weakness to the Rock type; 0.25x, 0.5x, neutral, 2x, or 4x, respectively. Can be removed from the opposing side if any opposing Pokemon uses Mortal Spin, Rapid Spin, or Defog successfully, or is hit by Defog.
stoneaxe.shortDesc: Sets Stealth Rock on the target's side.

stoneedge.name: Stone Edge
stoneedge.desc: Has a higher chance for a critical hit.

storedpower.name: Stored Power
storedpower.desc: Power is equal to 20+(X*20), where X is the user's total stat stage changes that are greater than 0.
storedpower.shortDesc: + 20 power for each of the user's stat boosts.

struggle.name: Struggle
struggle.desc: Deals typeless damage to a random opposing Pokemon. If this move was successful, the user loses 1/4 of its maximum HP, rounded half up, and the Rock Head Ability does not prevent this. This move is automatically used if none of the user's known moves can be selected.
struggle.shortDesc: User loses 1/4 of its max HP.

stuffcheeks.name: Stuff Cheeks
stuffcheeks.desc: This move cannot be selected unless the user is holding a Berry. The user eats its Berry and raises its Defense by 2 stages. This effect is not prevented by the Klutz or Unnerve Abilities, or the effects of Embargo or Magic Room. Fails if the user is not holding a Berry.
stuffcheeks.shortDesc: Must hold Berry to use. User eats Berry, Def +2.

superfang.name: Super Fang
superfang.desc: Deals damage to the target equal to half of its current HP, rounded down, but not less than 1 HP.
superfang.shortDesc: Does damage equal to 1/2 target's current HP.

superpower.name: Superpower
superpower.desc: Lowers the user's Attack and Defense by 1 stage.
superpower.shortDesc: Lowers the user's Attack and Defense by 1.

surgingstrikes.name: Surging Strikes
surgingstrikes.desc: Hits three times. This move is always a critical hit unless the target is under the effect of Lucky Chant or has the Battle Armor or Shell Armor Abilities.
surgingstrikes.shortDesc: Always results in a critical hit. Hits 3 times.

swift.name: Swift
swift.desc: This move does not check accuracy.
swift.shortDesc: This move does not check accuracy. Hits foes.

switcheroo.name: Switcheroo
switcheroo.desc: The user swaps its held item with the target's held item. Fails if either the user or the target is holding a Mail or Z-Crystal, if neither is holding an item, if the user is trying to give or take a Mega Stone to or from the species that can Mega Evolve with it, or if the user is trying to give or take a Blue Orb, a Red Orb, a Griseous Orb, a Plate, a Drive, or a Memory to or from a Kyogre, a Groudon, a Giratina, an Arceus, a Genesect, or a Silvally, respectively. The target is immune to this move if it has the Sticky Hold Ability.
switcheroo.shortDesc: User switches its held item with the target's.

synthesis.name: Synthesis
synthesis.desc: The user restores 1/2 of its maximum HP if Delta Stream or no weather conditions are in effect or if the user is holding Utility Umbrella, 2/3 of its maximum HP if the weather is Desolate Land or Sunny Day, and 1/4 of its maximum HP if the weather is Primordial Sea, Rain Dance, Sandstorm, or Snow, all rounded half down.
synthesis.shortDesc: Heals the user by a weather-dependent amount.

tailglow.name: Tail Glow
tailglow.desc: Raises the user's Special Attack by 3 stages.
tailglow.shortDesc: Raises the user's Sp. Atk by 3.

tailwhip.name: Tail Whip
tailwhip.desc: Lowers the target's Defense by 1 stage.

takedown.name: Take Down
takedown.desc: If the target lost HP, the user takes recoil damage equal to 1/4 the HP lost by the target, rounded half up, but not less than 1 HP.

takeheart.name: Take Heart
takeheart.desc: The user cures its non-volatile status condition. Raises the user's Special Attack and Special Defense by 1 stage.
takeheart.shortDesc: Cures user's status, raises Sp. Atk, Sp. Def by 1.

taunt.name: Taunt
taunt.desc: Prevents the target from using non-damaging moves for its next three turns. Pokemon with the Oblivious Ability or protected by the Aroma Veil Ability are immune.
taunt.shortDesc: Target can't use status moves its next 3 turns.

teeterdance.name: Teeter Dance
teeterdance.desc: Causes the target to become confused.

telekinesis.name: Telekinesis
telekinesis.desc: For 3 turns, the target cannot avoid any attacks made against it, other than OHKO moves, as long as it remains active. During the effect, the target is immune to Ground-type attacks and the effects of Spikes, Toxic Spikes, Sticky Web, and the Arena Trap Ability as long as it remains active. If the target uses Baton Pass, the replacement will gain the effect. Ingrain, Smack Down, Thousand Arrows, and Iron Ball override this move if the target is under any of their effects. Fails if the target is already under this effect or the effects of Ingrain, Smack Down, or Thousand Arrows. The target is immune to this move on use if its species is Diglett, Dugtrio, Alolan Diglett, Alolan Dugtrio, Sandygast, Palossand, or Gengar while Mega-Evolved. Mega Gengar cannot be under this effect by any means.
telekinesis.shortDesc: For 3 turns, target floats but moves can't miss it.

terablast.name: Tera Blast
terablast.desc: If the user is Terastallized, this move becomes a physical attack if the user's Attack is greater than its Special Attack, including stat stage changes, and this move's type becomes the same as the user's Tera Type.
terablast.shortDesc: If Terastallized: Phys. if Atk > SpA, type = Tera.

terrainpulse.name: Terrain Pulse
terrainpulse.desc: Power doubles if the user is grounded and a terrain is active, and this move's type changes to match. Electric type during Electric Terrain, Grass type during Grassy Terrain, Fairy type during Misty Terrain, and Psychic type during Psychic Terrain.
terrainpulse.shortDesc: User on terrain: power doubles, type varies.

thousandarrows.name: Thousand Arrows
thousandarrows.desc: This move can hit airborne Pokemon, which includes Flying-type Pokemon, Pokemon with the Levitate Ability, Pokemon holding an Air Balloon, and Pokemon under the effect of Magnet Rise or Telekinesis. If the target is a Flying type and is not already grounded, this move deals neutral damage regardless of its other type(s). This move can hit a target using Bounce, Fly, or Sky Drop. If this move hits a target under the effect of Bounce, Fly, Magnet Rise, or Telekinesis, the effect ends. If the target is a Flying type that has not used Roost this turn or a Pokemon with the Levitate Ability, it loses its immunity to Ground-type attacks and the Arena Trap Ability as long as it remains active. During the effect, Magnet Rise fails for the target and Telekinesis fails against the target.
thousandarrows.shortDesc: Grounds adjacent foes. First hit neutral on Flying.

thousandwaves.name: Thousand Waves
thousandwaves.desc: Prevents the target from switching out. The target can still switch out if it is holding Shed Shell or uses Baton Pass, Flip Turn, Parting Shot, Teleport, U-turn, or Volt Switch. If the target leaves the field using Baton Pass, the replacement will remain trapped. The effect ends if the user leaves the field.
thousandwaves.shortDesc: Hits adjacent foes. Prevents them from switching.

thrash.name: Thrash
thrash.desc: The user spends two or three turns locked into this move and becomes confused immediately after its move on the last turn of the effect if it is not already. This move targets an opposing Pokemon at random on each turn. If the user is prevented from moving, is asleep at the beginning of a turn, or the attack is not successful against the target on the first turn of the effect or the second turn of a three-turn effect, the effect ends without causing confusion. If this move is called by Sleep Talk and the user is asleep, the move is used for one turn and does not confuse the user.
thrash.shortDesc: Lasts 2-3 turns. Confuses the user afterwards.

throatchop.name: Throat Chop
throatchop.desc: For 2 turns, the target cannot use sound-based moves.
throatchop.shortDesc: For 2 turns, the target cannot use sound moves.

thundercage.name: Thunder Cage
thundercage.desc: Prevents the target from switching for four or five turns (seven turns if the user is holding Grip Claw). Causes damage to the target equal to 1/8 of its maximum HP (1/6 if the user is holding Binding Band), rounded down, at the end of each turn during effect. The target can still switch out if it is holding Shed Shell or uses Baton Pass, Flip Turn, Parting Shot, Shed Tail, Teleport, U-turn, or Volt Switch. The effect ends if either the user or the target leaves the field, or if the target uses Mortal Spin, Rapid Spin, or Substitute successfully. This effect is not stackable or reset by using this or another binding move.
thundercage.shortDesc: Traps and damages the target for 4-5 turns.

thunderfang.name: Thunder Fang
thunderfang.desc: Has a 10% chance to paralyze the target and a 10% chance to make it flinch.
thunderfang.shortDesc: 10% chance to paralyze. 10% chance to flinch.

thundershock.name: Thunder Shock
thundershock.desc: Has a 10% chance to paralyze the target.

thunderwave.name: Thunder Wave
thunderwave.desc: Paralyzes the target. This move does not ignore type immunity.

tickle.name: Tickle
tickle.desc: Lowers the target's Attack and Defense by 1 stage.
tickle.shortDesc: Lowers the target's Attack and Defense by 1.

tidyup.name: Tidy Up
tidyup.desc: Raises the user's Attack and Speed by 1 stage. Removes subtitutes from all active Pokemon and ends the effects of Spikes, Stealth Rock, Sticky Web, and Toxic Spikes for both sides.
tidyup.shortDesc: User +1 Atk, Spe. Clears all substitutes/hazards.

torchsong.name: Torch Song
torchsong.desc: Has a 100% chance to raise the user's Special Attack by 1 stage.
torchsong.shortDesc: 100% chance to raise the user's Sp. Atk by 1.

torment.name: Torment
torment.desc: Prevents the target from selecting the same move for use two turns in a row. This effect ends when the target is no longer active.
torment.shortDesc: Target can't select the same move twice in a row.

toxicspikes.name: Toxic Spikes
toxicspikes.desc: Sets up a hazard on the opposing side of the field, poisoning each opposing Pokemon that switches in, unless it is a Flying-type Pokemon or has the Levitate Ability. Can be used up to two times before failing. Opposing Pokemon become poisoned with one layer and badly poisoned with two layers. Can be removed from the opposing side if any opposing Pokemon uses Mortal Spin, Rapid Spin, or Defog successfully, is hit by Defog, or a grounded Poison-type Pokemon switches in. Safeguard prevents the opposing party from being poisoned on switch-in, but a substitute does not.
toxicspikes.shortDesc: Poisons grounded foes on switch-in. Max 2 layers.

trailblaze.desc: Uses the user's Speed stat in damage calculation rather than Attack stat.
trailblaze.shortDesc: Uses the user's Speed stat in damage calculation rather than Attack stat.
trailblaze.name: Trailblaze

transform.name: Transform
transform.desc: The user transforms into the target. The target's current stats, stat stages, types, moves, Ability, weight, gender, and sprite are copied. The user's level and HP remain the same and each copied move receives only 5 PP, with a maximum of 5 PP each. The user can no longer change formes if it would have the ability to do so. This move fails if it hits a substitute, if either the user or the target is already transformed, or if either is behind an Illusion.
transform.shortDesc: Copies target's stats, moves, types, and Ability.

triplearrows.name: Triple Arrows
triplearrows.desc: Has a 50% chance to lower the target's Defense by 1 stage, a 30% chance to make it flinch, and a higher chance for a critical hit.

tripleaxel.name: Triple Axel
tripleaxel.desc: Hits three times. Power increases to 40 for the second hit and 60 for the third. This move checks accuracy for each hit, and the attack ends if the target avoids a hit. If one of the hits breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the remaining hits. If the user has the Skill Link Ability, this move will always hit three times.
tripleaxel.shortDesc: Hits 3 times. Each hit can miss, but power rises.

trumpcard.name: Trump Card
trumpcard.desc: The power of this move is based on the amount of PP remaining after normal PP reduction and the Pressure Ability resolve. 200 power for 0 PP, 80 power for 1 PP, 60 power for 2 PP, 50 power for 3 PP, and 40 power for 4 or more PP.
trumpcard.shortDesc: More power the fewer PP this move has left.

twinbeam.name: Twin Beam
twinbeam.desc: Hits twice. If the first hit breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the second hit.

twister.name: Twister
twister.desc: Has a 20% chance to make the target flinch. Power doubles if the target is using Bounce, Fly, or Sky Drop, or is under the effect of Sky Drop.
twister.shortDesc: 20% chance to make the foe(s) flinch.

uturn.name: U-turn
uturn.desc: If this move is successful and the user has not fainted, the user switches out even if it is trapped and is replaced immediately by a selected party member. The user does not switch out if there are no unfainted party members, or if the target switched out using an Eject Button or through the effect of the Emergency Exit or Wimp Out Abilities.
uturn.shortDesc: User switches out after damaging the target.

vcreate.name: V-create
vcreate.desc: Lowers the user's Speed, Defense, and Special Defense by 1 stage.
vcreate.shortDesc: Lowers the user's Defense, Sp. Def, Speed by 1.

veeveevolley.name: Veevee Volley
veeveevolley.desc: Power is equal to the greater of (user's Happiness * 2/5), rounded down, or 1.

venoshock.name: Venoshock
venoshock.desc: Power doubles if the target is poisoned.
venoshock.shortDesc: Power doubles if the target is poisoned.

victorydance.name: Victory Dance
victorydance.desc: Raises the user's Attack, Defense, and Speed by 1 stage.
victorydance.shortDesc: Raises the user's Attack, Defense, Speed by 1.

vitalthrow.name: Vital Throw
vitalthrow.desc: This move does not check accuracy.
vitalthrow.shortDesc: This move does not check accuracy. Goes last.

voltswitch.name: Volt Switch
voltswitch.desc: If this move is successful and the user has not fainted, the user switches out even if it is trapped and is replaced immediately by a selected party member. The user does not switch out if there are no unfainted party members, or if the target switched out using an Eject Button or through the effect of the Emergency Exit or Wimp Out Abilities.
voltswitch.shortDesc: User switches out after damaging the target.

volttackle.name: Volt Tackle
volttackle.desc: Has a 10% chance to paralyze the target. If the target lost HP, the user takes recoil damage equal to 33% the HP lost by the target, rounded half up, but not less than 1 HP.
volttackle.shortDesc: Has 33% recoil. 10% chance to paralyze target.

waterpulse.name: Water Pulse
waterpulse.desc: Has a 20% chance to confuse the target.

wavecrash.name: Wave Crash
wavecrash.desc: If the target lost HP, the user takes recoil damage equal to 33% the HP lost by the target, rounded half up, but not less than 1 HP.

wickedblow.name: Wicked Blow
wickedblow.desc: This move is always a critical hit unless the target is under the effect of Lucky Chant or has the Battle Armor or Shell Armor Abilities.
wickedblow.shortDesc: Always results in a critical hit.

wickedtorque.name: Wicked Torque
wickedtorque.desc: Has a 10% chance to cause the target to fall asleep.
wickedtorque.shortDesc: 10% chance to cause the target to fall asleep.

wildboltstorm.name: Wildbolt Storm
wildboltstorm.desc: Has a 20% chance to paralyze the target. If the weather is Primordial Sea or Rain Dance, this move does not check accuracy. If this move is used against a Pokemon holding Utility Umbrella, this move's accuracy remains at 80%.
wildboltstorm.shortDesc: 20% chance to paralyze foe(s). Rain: can't miss.

wish.name: Wish
wish.desc: At the end of the next turn, the Pokemon at the user's position has 1/2 of the user's maximum HP restored to it, rounded down. Fails if this move is already in effect for the user's position.
wish.shortDesc: Next turn, 50% of the user's max HP is restored.

withdraw.name: Withdraw
withdraw.desc: Raises the user's Defense by 1 stage.

woodhammer.name: Wood Hammer
woodhammer.desc: If the target lost HP, the user takes recoil damage equal to 33% the HP lost by the target, rounded half up, but not less than 1 HP.

workup.name: Work Up
workup.desc: Raises the user's Attack and Special Attack by 1 stage.
workup.shortDesc: Raises the user's Attack and Sp. Atk by 1.

worryseed.name: Worry Seed
worryseed.desc: Causes the target's Ability to become Insomnia. Fails if the target's Ability is As One, Battle Bond, Comatose, Commander, Disguise, Gulp Missile, Hadron Engine, Ice Face, Insomnia, Multitype, Orichalcum Pulse, Power Construct, Protosynthesis, Quark Drive, RKS System, Schooling, Shields Down, Stance Change, Truant, Zen Mode, or Zero to Hero.

wringout.name: Wring Out
wringout.desc: Power is equal to 120 * (target's current HP / target's maximum HP), rounded half down, but not less than 1.
wringout.shortDesc: More power the more HP the target has left.

yawn.name: Yawn
yawn.desc: Causes the target to fall asleep at the end of the next turn. Fails when used if the target cannot fall asleep or if it already has a non-volatile status condition. At the end of the next turn, if the target is still active, does not have a non-volatile status condition, and can fall asleep, it falls asleep. If the target becomes affected, this effect cannot be prevented by Safeguard or a substitute, or by falling asleep and waking up during the effect.
yawn.shortDesc: Puts the target to sleep after 1 turn.

zapcannon.name: Zap Cannon
zapcannon.desc: Has a 100% chance to paralyze the target.

zippyzap.name: Zippy Zap
zippyzap.desc: Has a 100% chance to raise the user's evasion by 1 stage.

hiddenforce.name: Hidden Force
hiddenforce.desc: A unique attack that varies in type and intensity depending on the Pokemon using it.
hiddenforce.shortDesc: A unique attack that varies in type and intensity depending on the Pokemon using it.

hijumpkick.name: Hi Jump Kick
hijumpkick.desc: The target is attacked with a knee kick from a jump. If it misses, the user is hurt instead.
hijumpkick.shortDesc: The target is attacked with a knee kick from a jump. If it misses, the user is hurt instead.

gogcelebrate.name: GOGCelebrate
gogcelebrate.desc: The Pokemon congratulates you on your special day!
gogcelebrate.shortDesc: The Pokemon congratulates you on your special day!

woodhit.name: Wood Hit
woodhit.desc: The user hits the foe with wood. Yeah.
woodhit.shortDesc: The user hits the foe with wood. Yeah.

papertoss.name: Paper Toss
papertoss.desc: The user tosses a piece of paper.
papertoss.shortDesc: The user tosses a piece of paper.

papergun.name: Paper Gun
papergun.desc: The target is shot with pieces of paper over and over.
papergun.shortDesc: The target is shot with pieces of paper over and over.

fold.name: Fold
fold.desc: The user folds itself to raise its Defense and Sp. Def stats and increase power of next paper move.
fold.shortDesc: The user folds itself to raise its Defense and Sp. Def stats and increase power of next paper move.

papercut.name: Paper Cut
papercut.desc: The target is attacked with a slash of paper. Critical hits land more easily.
papercut.shortDesc: The target is attacked with a slash of paper. Critical hits land more easily.

paperball.name: Paper Ball
paperball.desc: The user continually rolls into the target over five turns. It becomes stronger each time it hits.
paperball.shortDesc: The user continually rolls into the target over five turns. It becomes stronger each time it hits.

lavaspit.name: Lava Spit
lavaspit.desc: The target is attacked with small spit of lava. It may also leave the target with a burn.
lavaspit.shortDesc: The target is attacked with small spit of lava. It may also leave the target with a burn.

magmaburst.name: Magma Burst
magmaburst.desc: The target is attacked with a burst of magma. Critical hits land more easily.
magmaburst.shortDesc: The target is attacked with a burst of magma. Critical hits land more easily.

volcaniceruption.name: Volcanic Eruption
volcaniceruption.desc: The target is blasted by a huge volume of magma launched under great pressure.
volcaniceruption.shortDesc: The target is blasted by a huge volume of magma launched under great pressure.

lavabomb.name: Lava Bomb
lavabomb.desc: The target is blasted by a bomb of lava. It may also make the target flinch or leave it burned.
lavabomb.shortDesc: The target is blasted by a bomb of lava. It may also make the target flinch or leave it burned.

kindle.name: Kindle
kindle.desc: The user stokes the flames within to raise its Sp. Atk and Sp. Def stats.
kindle.shortDesc: The user stokes the flames within to raise its Sp. Atk and Sp. Def stats.

megamissile.name: Mega Missile
megamissile.desc: Raises user's Atk first turn, attacks on the second turn.
megamissile.shortDesc: Raises user's Atk first turn, attacks on the second turn.

micromissiles.name: Micro Missiles
micromissiles.desc: The user fires mini missiles at the target. Two to five missiles are launched in quick succession.
micromissiles.shortDesc: The user fires mini missiles at the target. Two to five missiles are launched in quick succession.

oilup.name: Oil Up
oilup.desc: The user oils up its joints. It drastically boosts the Speed stat but makes user take x2 from Fire for 3 turns.
oilup.shortDesc: The user oils up its joints. It drastically boosts the Speed stat but makes user take x2 from Fire for 3 turns.

techsavvy.name: Tech Savvy
techsavvy.desc: The user shows its apptitude with technology to raise its Sp. Atk and Sp. Def stats.
techsavvy.shortDesc: The user shows its apptitude with technology to raise its Sp. Atk and Sp. Def stats.

hydraulickick.name: Hydraulic Kick
hydraulickick.desc: The user kicks with a hydraulic motion. Critical hits land more easily.
hydraulickick.shortDesc: The user kicks with a hydraulic motion. Critical hits land more easily.

pistonpunch.name: Piston Punch
pistonpunch.desc: The target is punched with an pistoned fist. It may also leave the target with paralysis.
pistonpunch.shortDesc: The target is punched with an pistoned fist. It may also leave the target with paralysis.

dacoball.name: DACO BALL
dacoball.desc: The target is blasted with raw technology.
dacoball.shortDesc: The target is blasted with raw technology.

wirelash.name: Wire Lash
wirelash.desc: The user lashes with wires. It may also make the target flinch or leave it with paralysis.
wirelash.shortDesc: The user lashes with wires. It may also make the target flinch or leave it with paralysis.

energyshield.name: Energy Shield
energyshield.desc: The user puts up an energy shield. Raises user's Defense stat and sharply raises user's Sp. Def stat.
energyshield.shortDesc: The user puts up an energy shield. Raises user's Defense stat and sharply raises user's Sp. Def stat.

steamyspray.name: Steamy Spray
steamyspray.desc: The target is attacked with small spray of steam. It may also leave the target with a burn.
steamyspray.shortDesc: The target is attacked with small spray of steam. It may also leave the target with a burn.

steamer.name: Steamer
steamer.desc: The user tosses a steamer at the target. Yeah, that would freaking hurt
steamer.shortDesc: The user tosses a steamer at the target. Yeah, that would freaking hurt

steamball.name: Steam Ball
steamball.desc: The user hurls a steamy blob at the target. It may also lower the target's Sp. Def stat.
steamball.shortDesc: The user hurls a steamy blob at the target. It may also lower the target's Sp. Def stat.

boatbash.name: Boat Bash
boatbash.desc: The user bashes the opponent witgh a boat. This move is super effective on Water types.
boatbash.shortDesc: The user bashes the opponent witgh a boat. This move is super effective on Water types.

steamcharge.name: Steam-Charge
steamcharge.desc: A reckless, life-risking tackle with steam. It also damages the user by a fairly large amount, however.
steamcharge.shortDesc: A reckless, life-risking tackle with steam. It also damages the user by a fairly large amount, however.

frigofear.name: Frigo-fear
frigofear.desc: The target is struck with the phobia of the cold. It may also freeze the target solid.
frigofear.shortDesc: The target is struck with the phobia of the cold. It may also freeze the target solid.

fearpulse.name: Fear Pulse
fearpulse.desc: The user shoots out a pulse of raw fear. Critical hits land more easily.
fearpulse.shortDesc: The user shoots out a pulse of raw fear. Critical hits land more easily.

purefear.name: Pure Fear
purefear.desc: The target is blasted with pure and utter terror.
purefear.shortDesc: The target is blasted with pure and utter terror.

claustrogrip.name: Claustrogrip
claustrogrip.desc: The user invokes claustrophobia on the target.
claustrogrip.shortDesc: The user invokes claustrophobia on the target.

rubberrub.name: Rubber Rub
rubberrub.desc: The target is rubbed by rubber. It may make the target flinch.
rubberrub.shortDesc: The target is rubbed by rubber. It may make the target flinch.

rubbershot.name: Rubber Shot
rubbershot.desc: The user shoots rubber. The attack lands without fail.
rubbershot.shortDesc: The user shoots rubber. The attack lands without fail.

rubberball.name: Rubber Ball
rubberball.desc: The user continually rolls into the target over five turns. It becomes stronger each time it hits.
rubberball.shortDesc: The user continually rolls into the target over five turns. It becomes stronger each time it hits.

rubberray.name: Rubber Ray
rubberray.desc: The target is blasted with a ray of rubbery rubber.
rubberray.shortDesc: The target is blasted with a ray of rubbery rubber.

tirecrash.name: Tire Crash
tirecrash.desc: The user speeds into the target two to five times in a row. This move always goes first.
tirecrash.shortDesc: The user speeds into the target two to five times in a row. This move always goes first.

latexlash.desc: The target is lashed with latex. It may also leave the target with paralysis.
latexlash.shortDesc: The target is lashed with latex. It may also leave the target with paralysis.

cyclonepunch.name: Cyclone Punch
cyclonepunch.desc: The target is punched with a fist cloaked in wind. It may also leave the target with paralysis.
cyclonepunch.shortDesc: The target is punched with a fist cloaked in wind. It may also leave the target with paralysis.

stingpunch.name: Sting Punch
stingpunch.desc: The target is punched with an pistoned fist. It may also leave the target with paralysis.
stingpunch.shortDesc: The target is punched with an pistoned fist. It may also leave the target with paralysis.

swarmattack.name: Swarm Attack
swarmattack.desc: The user calls on a swarm to hit the foe 2-5 times.
swarmattack.shortDesc: The user calls on a swarm to hit the foe 2-5 times.

celestialray.name: Celestial Ray
celestialray.desc: The target is attacked with an odd cosmic wave. The attack varies in intensity.
celestialray.shortDesc: The target is attacked with an odd cosmic wave. The attack varies in intensity.

solarcrash.name: SolarCrash
solarcrash.desc: A two-turn attack. The user gathers light, then charges on the second turn.
solarcrash.shortDesc: A two-turn attack. The user gathers light, then charges on the second turn.

cometcrash.name: Comet Crash
cometcrash.desc: The target is hit by a speeding comet. It may also raise the user's Attack.
cometcrash.shortDesc: The target is hit by a speeding comet. It may also raise the user's Attack.

sunsflames.name: Sun's Flames
sunsflames.desc: The user harnesses the power of the sun itself. It may also leave the target with a burn.
sunsflames.shortDesc: The user harnesses the power of the sun itself. It may also leave the target with a burn.

lunarwave.name: Lunar Wave
lunarwave.desc: The user harnesses the power of the moon itself. It may also induce sleep.
lunarwave.shortDesc: The user harnesses the power of the moon itself. It may also induce sleep.

sprinkle.name: Sprinkle
sprinkle.desc: The user sprinkles sprinkles that both deal damage and lower stats
sprinkle.shortDesc: The user sprinkles sprinkles that both deal damage and lower stats

cookiecutter.name: Cookie Cutter
cookiecutter.desc: The target is COOKIE CUTTED. Critical hits land more easily.
cookiecutter.shortDesc: The target is COOKIE CUTTED. Critical hits land more easily.

cookieslam.name: Cookie Slam
cookieslam.desc: The user SLAMS into the foe as if a cookie. It also cuts the user's Defense and Sp. Def.
cookieslam.shortDesc: The user SLAMS into the foe as if a cookie. It also cuts the user's Defense and Sp. Def.

cakewalk.name: Cake Walk
cakewalk.desc: The user does a cake walk, sharply boosting one of its stats.
cakewalk.shortDesc: The user does a cake walk, sharply boosting one of its stats.

icecreambeam.name: Icecream Beam

necromancy.shortDesc: The user gets all the party Pokemon to attack the foe. The more party Pokemon, the more damage.

zombiehorde.name: Zombie Horde
zombiehorde.desc: The user summons a ravenous horde of zombies. Two to five zombies attack in quick succession.
zombiehorde.shortDesc: The user summons a ravenous horde of zombies. Two to five zombies attack in quick succession.

rottedclaw.name: Rotted Claw

bellyflop.name: Bellyflop

hivemind.desc: The user rampages and attacks for two to three turns. It then becomes confused, however.
hivemind.shortDesc: The user rampages and attacks for two to three turns. It then becomes confused, however.
hivemind.name: Hivemind

quicksand.desc: The user traps the target in a thick layer of quicksand. It may also cause paralysis.
quicksand.shortDesc: The user traps the target in a thick layer of quicksand. It may also cause paralysis.
quicksand.name: Quick Sand

downpour.desc: The user drops a torrential downpour down on the target which causes it to rain.
downpour.shortDesc: The user drops a torrential downpour down on the target which causes it to rain.
downpour.name: Downpour

atombomb.desc: The user lets off an atomic bomb. It also damages the user by a fairly large amount, however.
atombomb.shortDesc: The user lets off an atomic bomb. It also damages the user by a fairly large amount, however.
atombomb.name: Atom Bomb

concussion.desc: The user slams the target's head with a concussive force. It confuses the target if it hits.
concussion.shortDesc: The user slams the target's head with a concussive force. It confuses the target if it hits.
concussion.name: Concussion

sugarrush.desc: The user rampages and attacks for two to three turns. It then becomes confused, however.
sugarrush.shortDesc: The user rampages and attacks for two to three turns. It then becomes confused, however.
sugarrush.name: Sugar Rush

riptide.desc: User traps target for four to five turns.
riptide.shortDesc: User traps target for four to five turns.
riptide.name: Riptide

plunder.desc: The user attacks and steals the foe's held item simultaneously. It can't steal if the user holds an item.
plunder.shortDesc: The user attacks and steals the foe's held item simultaneously. It can't steal if the user holds an item.
plunder.name: Plunder

homerunbat.desc: The user knocks away the target and drags out another Pokemon in its party. In the wild, the battle ends.
homerunbat.shortDesc: The user knocks away the target and drags out another Pokemon in its party. In the wild, the battle ends.
homerunbat.name: Homerun Bat

meltedplastic.name: Melted Plastic
meltedplastic.desc: Has a 30% chance to burn the target. The target thaws out if it is frozen.
meltedplastic.shortDesc: 30% chance to burn the target. Thaws target.

uproot.desc: The user loses its Grass-type. Cannot be used if not Grass-type.
uproot.shortDesc: The user loses its Grass-type. Cannot be used if not Grass-type.
uproot.name: Uproot

pukeblood.desc: The user also takes terrible damage.
pukeblood.shortDesc: The user also takes terrible damage.
pukeblood.name: Puke Blood

halflife.desc: It cuts everything around the user's HP to half.
halflife.shortDesc: It cuts everything around the user's HP to half.
halflife.name: Half-Life

nosedive.desc: Building up more power, it raises the user's Speed stat.
nosedive.shortDesc: Building up more power, it raises the user's Speed stat.
nosedive.name: Nosedive

sandblast.desc: Does double damage during a Sandstorm.
sandblast.shortDesc: Does double damage during a Sandstorm.
sandblast.name: Sandblast

bouncyball.desc: The user bounces up high, then drops on the foe on the second turn. It may also paralyze the foe.
bouncyball.shortDesc: The user bounces up high, then drops on the foe on the second turn. It may also paralyze the foe.
bouncyball.name: Bouncy Ball

bearhug.desc: Lowers the foe's defense and squeezes the foe for four to five turns.
bearhug.shortDesc: Lowers the foe's defense and squeezes the foe for four to five turns.
bearhug.name: Bear Hug

fadereflection.desc: May disable the last move used by the target.
fadereflection.shortDesc: May disable the last move used by the target.
fadereflection.name: Fade Reflection

plasticblaze.desc: It may also leave the target with a burn.
plasticblaze.shortDesc: It may also leave the target with a burn.
plasticblaze.name: Plastic Blaze

carcrash.desc: Paralyzes the user and the target.
carcrash.shortDesc: Paralyzes the user and the target.
carcrash.name: Car Crash

frostbite.desc: A deathly cold touch that may burn the target.
frostbite.shortDesc: A deathly cold touch that may burn the target.
frostbite.name: Frostbite

scavenge.desc: User recovers the last item the opponent held and consumed.
scavenge.shortDesc: User recovers the last item the opponent held and consumed.

glassing.desc: Hits both targets, transforming them into Glass-type.
glassing.shortDesc: Hits both targets, transforming them into Glass-type.

mindbreak.desc: Confuses, Sleeps, Infatuates the target if they are the opposite gender.
mindbreak.shortDesc: Confuses, Sleeps, Infatuates the target if they are the opposite gender.

banhammer.desc: The user knocks away the target and drags out another Pokemon in its party. In the wild, the battle ends.
banhammer.shortDesc: The user knocks away the target and drags out another Pokemon in its party. In the wild, the battle ends.

falconpunch.desc: The target is punched with a fiery fist. It may leave the target with a burn.
falconpunch.shortDesc: The target is punched with a fiery fist. It may leave the target with a burn.
falconpunch.name: Falcon Punch

maxairstream.name: Max Airstream
maxairstream.desc: Power is equal to the base move's Max Move power. If this move is successful, the Speed of each Pokemon on the user's side is raised by 1 stage, even if they have a substitute. This effect does not happen if the user is not Dynamaxed. If this move is used as a base move, it deals damage with a power of 0.
maxairstream.shortDesc: Base move affects power. Allies: +1 Speed.

maxdarkness.name: Max Darkness
maxdarkness.desc: Power is equal to the base move's Max Move power. If this move is successful, the Special Defense of each Pokemon on the opposing side is lowered by 1 stage, even if they have a substitute. This effect does not happen if the user is not Dynamaxed. If this move is used as a base move, it deals damage with a power of 0.
maxdarkness.shortDesc: Base move affects power. Foes: -1 Sp. Def.

maxflare.name: Max Flare
maxflare.desc: Power is equal to the base move's Max Move power. If this move is successful, the effect of Sunny Day begins. This effect does not happen if the user is not Dynamaxed. If this move is used as a base move, it deals damage with a power of 0.
maxflare.shortDesc: Base move affects power. Starts Sunny Day.

If this move is successful, the Special Attack of each Pokemon on the opposing side is lowered by 1 stage, even if they have a substitute. This effect does not happen if the user is not Dynamaxed. If this move is used as a base move, it deals damage with a power of 0.
maxflutterby.shortDesc: Base move affects power. Foes: -1 Sp. Atk.

maxguard.name: Max Guard
maxguard.desc: The user is protected from nearly all attacks made by other Pokemon during this turn, including Max and G-Max Moves. This move has a 1/X chance of being successful, where X starts at 1 and triples each time this move is successfully used. X resets to 1 if this move fails, if the user's last move used is not Baneful Bunker, Detect, Endure, King's Shield, Max Guard, Obstruct, Protect, Quick Guard, Spiky Shield, or Wide Guard, or if it was one of those moves and the user's protection was broken. Fails if the user moves last this turn.
maxguard.shortDesc: Protects user from moves & Max Moves this turn.

maxhailstorm.name: Max Hailstorm
maxhailstorm.desc: Power is equal to the base move's Max Move power. If this move is successful, the effect of Hail begins. This effect does not happen if the user is not Dynamaxed. If this move is used as a base move, it deals damage with a power of 0.

technoblast.name: Techno Blast
technoblast.desc: This move's type depends on the user's held Drive.
technoblast.shortDesc: Type varies based on the held Drive.

aircutter.name: Air Cutter
aircutter.desc: Has a higher chance for a critical hit.
aircutter.shortDesc: High critical hit ratio. Hits adjacent foes.

bloodmoon.name: Blood Moon
bloodmoon.desc: Cannot be used twice in a row.
bloodmoon.shortDesc: Cannot be used twice in a row.

charm.name: Charm
charm.desc: Lowers the target's Attack by 2 stages.

crabhammer.name: Crabhammer
crabhammer.desc: Has a higher chance for a critical hit.

selfdestruct.name: Self-Destruct
selfdestruct.desc: The user faints after using this move, even if this move fails for having no target. This move is prevented from executing if any active Pokemon has the Damp Ability.
selfdestruct.shortDesc: Hits adjacent Pokemon. The user faints.

boltbeam.name: Boltbeam
boltbeam.desc: Hits 2 times in one turn. First hit is Electric-type and second is Ice-type.
boltbeam.shortDesc: Hits 2 times in one turn. First hit is Electric-type and second is Ice-type.

lasagnatoss.name: Lasagna Toss
lasagnatoss.desc: The user and any Pokemon hit eat their items. Berries are eaten and used up while other items completely disappear.

eructlas.name: Eruc Tlas
eructlas.desc: Heals the target equal to 1/4 of its maximum HP (1/8 if the target is Steel or Water type), rounded down, at the end of each turn during effect. This effect ends when the target is no longer active.
eructlas.shortDesc: Heals the target 1/4 max HP each turn; 1/8 on Steel, Water.

glaiverest.name: Glaive Rest
glaiverest.desc: User sleeps 2 turns and restores HP and status. User takes sure-hit 2x damage until its next turn.
glaiverest.shortDesc: User sleeps 2 turns and restores HP and status. User takes sure-hit 2x damage until its next turn.

metronomeifitwasfunny.name: Metronome If It Was Funny
metronomeifitwasfunny.desc: You know all those moves Metronome can't pull? That's old news.
metronomeifitwasfunny.shortDesc: You know all those moves Metronome can't pull? That's old news.

genesisboost.name: Genesis Boost
genesisboost.desc: Fails unless it is the user's first turn on the field. Raises the user's Attack and Defense by 2.
genesisboost.shortDesc: Usually goes first. First turn out only. Raises the user's Attack and Defense by 2.

mitada.name: Mitada
mitada.desc: Power is equal to 50+(X*50), where X is the total number of times the user has been hit by a damaging attack during the battle, even if the user did not lose HP from the attack. X cannot be greater than 6 and does not reset upon switching out or fainting. Each hit of a multi-hit attack is counted, but confusion damage is not counted.
mitada.shortDesc: +50 power for each time user was hit. 200 BP max

frozensong.name: Frozen Song
frozensong.desc: For 1 turns, the target is prevented from restoring any HP as long as it remains active. During the effect, healing and draining moves are unusable, and Abilities and items that grant healing will not heal the user. If an affected Pokemon uses Baton Pass, the replacement will remain unable to restore its HP. Pain Split and the Regenerator Ability are unaffected.
frozensong.shortDesc: For 1 turns, the foe(s) is prevented from healing.

mindjack.name: Mindjack
mindjack.desc: Fails if the target doesn't have a held item.
mindjack.shortDesc: Fails if the target doesn't have a held item.
